121 Savage Quotes for Haters and Jealous Enemies to Share on Instagram

121 Savage Quotes for Haters and Jealous Enemies to Share on Instagram

121 Savage Quotes for Haters and Jealous Enemies to Share on Instagram

In the journey of life in the world, haters and jealous enemies stalk in the shadows. These individuals seem to enjoy spreading negativity. They also try to drain others' spirits. Don't allow their toxic energy to bring us down. Try to turn the tables and use their negativity to fuel our charge. Enter the world of savage quotes – a realm where words become weapons. These savage quotes deliver sharp responses. They also make comebacks to silence the haters. Leave them questioning their own arrogance.

In the age of Instagram, it's crucial to ready ourselves to combat the attack of hate and jealousy. Savage quotes have become a tool for keeping our strength and our self-worth. They capture the attention of the followers at the same time as shutting down the critics.

These savage quotes blend humor, confidence, and embrace of one's own power. Our strength and courage can be expressed in savage quotes. They remind us that no matter how powerful the criticism storm may be. We have the strength to rise, leaving our enemies in awe of our spirit.

In this article, we explore a collection of savage quotes. They are specifically for those who wish to stand tall in hardship. It ranges from sassy one-liners to thought-provoking insights. These savage quotes keep you motivated, empowering you to overcome your challenges. So, the next time you meet a hater or a jealous enemy, arm yourself with these savage quotes. Let's look at these savage quotes and reclaim our power on social media.

Let's check out some of the savage quotes for haters, compiled from numerous sources, Sunday (25/06/2023).

1. “Hustle until your haters ask if you’re hiring.”
2. “Give the haters another reason to hate!!”
3. “Down to earth but still above you.”
4. “Kill them with your smile and bury them with your success.”
5. “Envy hate me rate me The bottom line is you ain’t me.”
6. “Lions don’t concern themselves with the opinion of sheep.”
7. “Dear Haters, I have so much more for you to be mad at.”
8. “I love making people who already hate me hate me more.”

8. “I love making people who already hate me hate me more.”
9. “Rumours are carried by haters, spread by fools, and accepted by idiots.”
10. “Love your haters – they’re your biggest fans.”
11. “Let them hate, it’s still motivation.”
12. “Opinions are like assholes: everybody has one.”
13. “Nobody has ever insulted me into liking them.”
14. “If you can’t handle me at my worst, then don’t even bother with me at my best.”
15. “Haters gonna hate, shake it off.”
16. “You don’t have to like me, but you do have respect my right to exist.”
17. “I don’t care what people think of me, I know who I am and that’s enough for me.”
18. “You may encounter many defeats but never lose hope.”
19. “You can always make something out of nothing.”
20. “I don’t need someone who hates me, I already hate myself enough for the both of us.

Savage Quotes for Haters That Are Inspiring

21. “You will face your most tremendous opposition when you are closest to your biggest miracle.”
22. “Hate me for who I am; I don’t care. But, at least I’m not pretending to be someone I’m not.”
23. “The only way to succeed is to make people hate you. That way, they remember you.”
24. “Respect your haters; they’re the only ones who think you’re better than them.”
25. “Don’t spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.”
26. “The truth will set you free, but first it will piss you off.”
27. “It’s not an insult, it’s a fact. You can be wrong and you can be annoying but never both at the same time.”
28. “Don’t let anyone rob you of your imagination, your creativity, or your curiosity.”

29. “We are all made in the image of God! Therefore, we should not envy one another and applaud one another upon achievement!”
30. “There will be haters, there will be doubters, there will be non-believers, and then there will be you, proving them wrong.”
31. “If someone tells you – you’re not beautiful, turn around and walk away so they can have a great view of your fabulous ass.”
32. “The best way to torture haters is with your happiness. There’s nothing people hate more than seeing you be successful.”
33. “Don’t worry about the haters… They are just angry because the truth you speak contradicts the lie they live.”
34. “Haters never win. I just think that’s true about life because negative energy always costs in the end.”
35. “Haters are my favourite. I’ve built an empire with the bricks they’ve thrown at me. Keep on hating.”

36. “Don’t be too sweet or they’ll eat you.”
37. “First they watch, then they hate, then they copy.”
38. “Dear haters, I have so much more for you to hate. Just watch.”
39. “I need new haters, the old ones became my fans.”
40. “Haters will broadcast your failure but whisper your success.”
41. “Believe in yourself and don’t care about haters.”
42. “Whoever is trying to bring you down is already below you.”
43. “If you’re testing my waters, you better know how to swim.”
44. “Keep your head high, and your middle finger higher.”
45. “Staying with detractors is like sleeping in a room located just behind the public toilet. You will never feel comfortable until you relocate.”

Savage Quotes for Haters to Make You Giggle

46. “These days loving someone is a rare feeling; sometimes, all you will get throughout your life is hatred.”
47. “I don’t give any reason for anyone to hate me. They create their own little drama out of jealousy.”

48. “The key to happiness is knowing you have the power of choosing what to accept and let go of.”
49. “We all have our different worlds, which create a difference and makes each other different.”
50. “I don’t dislike my haters, and they dislike me. I’m doing nothing wrong; I’m just me.”

Savage Quotes

51. “You changed because the people in your ear stay solid to the things that you know‼️”
52. “My mom always said that there would be haters. Not everyone can love you.”

53. “Isn’t it kind of silly to think that tearing someone else down builds you up?”
54. “Judging a person does not define who they are. It explains who you are.”
55. “Dear haters, I am flattered that I’m always a trending topic in your life.”

56. “Behind every successful person lies a pack of haters! I love my haters!”
57. “Haters are just confused admirers because they can’t figure out the reason why everyone loves you.”
58. “Don’t worry about those who talk behind your back, they’re behind you for a reason.”
59. “The greatest revenge is massive success.”
60. “Haters act like they know you but rarely do — stay above it all and keep moving.”
61. “No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.”
62. “Sticks and stones may break my bones but words will never hurt me.”
63. “Haters don’t really hate you, they hate themselves; because you’re a reflection of what they wish to be.”

Savage Quotes to Help You Avoid Negative People

64. “A hater’s only job is to make sure other people don’t succeed…why waste time doing someone else’s job?”
65. “I believe in kindness and respect without expectation.”
66. “Your hate won’t stop me from becoming what I’m destined to become.”
67. “Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.”

68. “Don’t worry about those who talk behind your back, they’re behind you for a reason.”
69. “Just because someone doesn’t like you it doesn’t mean there’s something wrong with you; It just means their poison doesn’t agree with yours!”
70. “A hater is only one step removed from a fan; the only difference is how they express themselves.”

Savage Quotes for Haters to Make You Smile

71. “Stop looking for happiness in the same place you lost it.”
72. “Hatred paralyzes life; love releases it. Hatred confuses life; love harmonizes it,. Hatred darkens life; love illuminates it.”
73. "You will face your greatest opposition when you are closest to your biggest miracle."

73. "You will face your greatest opposition when you are closest to your biggest miracle."
74. "I don't dislike my haters, they dislike me. I'm doing nothing wrong, I'm just being me."
75. "Haters never win. I just think that's true about life, because negative energy always costs in the end."
76. "To anyone that ever told you you're no good... They’re no better."
77. "Nations have come under the control of haters and fools."
78. "B*tch you are so fake you make Barbie look real."
79. "Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door."
80. "If someone tells you you're not beautiful, turn around and walk away so they can have a great view of your fabulous ass."
81. "Don't worry about the haters... They are just angry because the truth you speak contradicts the lie they live."

82. "Haters will broadcast your failure, but whisper your success."
83. "Lord, protect me from my friends; I can take care of my enemies."
84. "Lions don’t concern themselves with the opinion of sheep."
85. "I may not be perfect, but at least I’m not you."

86. “People will always have their opinion on you despite who you are and what your capable of.”– Ana Chable
87. “The only thing more frustrating than slanderers is those foolish enough to listen to them.”– Criss Jami
88. "Normally, I try not to pay attention to my haters, but this time I'd like to talk about it, because my haters are my motivators."
89. "To hate everything is to be wounded by everything."
90. "There’s a little bit of devil in her angel eyes."
91. "I can remove most of your beauty from a wet wipe."
92. "Queens don’t compete with hoes."
93. "Learn to use the criticism as fuel and you will never run out of energy." – Orrin Woodward

Savage Quotes for Haters for Love and Friendship

94. "Insecure people put others down to raise themselves up." – Habeeb Akande
95. "You will face your greatest opposition when you are closest to your biggest miracle." – Shannon L. Alde
96. "Rumors are carried by haters, spread by fools, and accepted by idiots." – Nishan Panwar
97. "You know, hating me won’t make your sad life any better."

98. "I can’t help imagining how much awesomer the world would be if your dad had just pulled out."

99. "Haters only hate the things that they can’t get and the people they can’t be."

100. "Haters will talk shit but wanna be where I sit, so lames can envy because I am the top bitch."

Savage Quotes

101. "There are some remarkably dumb people in this world. Thanks for helping me understand that."
102. "Haters; kill them with success and bury them with a smile."
103. "B.I.T.C.H = Beautiful Individuals that Create Haters."
104. "Haters stay mad because they can’t have the attention you have!"
105. "Were you born on the highway? That is where most accidents happen."
106. "Your ass must be pretty jealous of all the shit that comes out of your mouth."
107. "Do you ever wonder what life would be like if you’d gotten enough oxygen at birth?"
108. "I was going to give you a nasty look but I see that you’ve already got one."

Savage Quotes for Haters to Boost Your Joy

108. "I was going to give you a nasty look but I see that you’ve already got one."
109. "If you’re waiting for me to care, I hope you brought something to eat, ‘cause it’s gonna be a really long time."
110. "Sometimes it’s better to keep your mouth shut and give the impression that you’re stupid than open it and remove all doubt."
111. “Sorry, the person you’re trying to call has changed and reached the level of attitude where you can’t get over it.”
112. “Always be trending topic in your hater’s life.”
113. "Are you always such an idiot, or do you just show off when I’m around?"
114. "I don’t believe in plastic surgery,
But in your case. Go ahead."
115. “Blocking is for kids. I want you to see me and Burn.”
116. “Don’t me so quick to judge me. You only see what I choose to show you.”
117. “When people don’t want the best for you, they are not the best for you.” ― Gayle King

118. “Smile when they pull you down — it drives them crazy.”
119. “Sometimes you just have to play the role of a fool to fool the fool who think they are fooling you.”
120. “I don’t have time, energy, or interest in hating the haters; I’m too busy loving the lovers.” ― Steve Maraboli
121. “If you don’t like what I’m doing but still watch everything I do, then let’s face it you’re a fan.”

Let's conclude our exploration of Instagram's savage quotes for haters and jealous enemies. It's essential to remember that our true strength lies in words. We also hold a belief in ourselves that persists.

In adopting the power of savage quotes, we acknowledge that the negativity toward us does not fix us. By sharing these quotes on Instagram, we inspire others to stand tall. Plus help them find their own voice amidst social media chaos.

Savage Quotes

item.title: cheese fondue
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
Cheese Fondue Recipe: The Classic Swiss Comfort Food in 2 Variations

Have you ever wanted to create a warm, cozy dinner that brings everyone together around one pot? A cheese fondue recipe is the perfect answer for special occasions and family gatherings.

Cheese fondue is a traditional Swiss dish where melted cheese is kept warm in a special pot called a caquelon. People use long forks to dip pieces of bread and other foods into the melted cheese, creating a fun and social dining experience. This delicious cheese fondue recipe became popular in the 1960s and remains a favorite comfort food today. The dish uses white wine, cheese, and special seasonings to create a smooth, creamy sauce.

In this article, we will share our classic cheese fondue recipe as well as the spicy version of the recipe for those who want some extra kick in their dish. We will also talk about what to dip into the cheese fondue, tips to get the best result, and how to store and use the leftovers. We gathered the recipe and tips from various sources, Wednesday (4/6/2025).

Classic Cheese Fondue Recipe

This traditional cheese fondue recipe uses classic Swiss cheeses and creates a smooth, rich texture. The combination of Gruyère and Emmental cheese gives the fondue its authentic Swiss flavor.

Ingredients:

- 1 pound Gruyère cheese, grated

- 8 ounces Emmental cheese, grated

- 1 cup dry white wine

- 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice

- 1 clove garlic, halved

- 2 tablespoons cornstarch

- 3 tablespoons kirsch (cherry brandy)

- 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg

- Salt and white pepper to taste

Instructions:

1. Prepare the pot: Rub the inside of your fondue pot with the cut garlic clove. This adds a subtle garlic flavor to your cheese fondue recipe.

2. Heat the wine: Pour the white wine and lemon juice into the fondue pot. Heat the mixture over medium-low heat until it starts to simmer gently. Do not let it boil hard.

3. Add the cheese: Gradually add the grated Gruyère and Emmental cheese to the wine. Stir constantly in a figure-eight pattern. This helps the cheese melt evenly and prevents lumps.

4. Make it smooth: Mix the cornstarch with the kirsch in a small bowl. Add this mixture to the melted cheese. Continue stirring until the fondue becomes smooth and creamy.

5. Season and serve: Add nutmeg, salt, and white pepper to taste. Keep the fondue warm over low heat and serve immediately with your favorite dipping foods.

Spicy Cheese Fondue Recipe

This exciting variation adds heat and bold flavors to the traditional cheese fondue recipe. The jalapeños and hot sauce create a modern twist on the classic dish.

Ingredients:

- 12 ounces sharp cheddar cheese, grated

- 4 ounces Monterey Jack cheese, grated

- 1 cup beer (light lager works best)

- 1 tablespoon lime juice

- 2 cloves garlic, minced

- 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour

- 2 jalapeño peppers, finely chopped

- 1 teaspoon hot sauce

- 1/2 teaspoon cumin

- Salt and black pepper to taste

Instructions:

1. Prepare the base: Heat the beer and lime juice in your fondue pot over medium heat. Let it warm up but do not boil.

2. Add garlic and peppers: Stir in the minced garlic and chopped jalapeños. Cook for 2 minutes to release their flavors.

3. Coat the cheese: Toss the grated cheddar and Monterey Jack cheese with flour in a large bowl. This helps thicken the fondue.

4. Melt the cheese: Add the cheese mixture to the pot one handful at a time. Stir constantly until each addition melts completely before adding more.

5. Finish and season: Stir in the hot sauce and cumin. Taste and add salt and pepper as needed. Keep warm and serve with sturdy dipping options.

The Best Types of Cheese to Make Cheese Fondue

The success of any cheese fondue recipe depends on choosing the right cheese varieties. Different cheeses melt at different rates and create different textures when heated.

Traditional Swiss cheeses work best for authentic fondue. Gruyère has a nutty, complex flavor and melts beautifully. Emmental is milder and adds creaminess. Swiss cheese from the grocery store can also work but has less flavor.

French cheeses create excellent fondue too. Comté has a similar taste to Gruyère but is slightly sweeter. Beaufort melts smoothly and has a rich, buttery flavor that many people love.

Other good options include Fontina, which melts easily and has a mild taste. Appenzeller adds a sharp, tangy flavor. Raclette is another traditional melting cheese that works well in fondue recipes.

Avoid these cheeses in your fondue: fresh mozzarella becomes stringy, aged cheddar can separate, and processed cheese creates an artificial taste. Always grate your cheese fresh for the best results.

What to Dip into Cheese Fondue

The right dipping foods can make or break your cheese fondue recipe experience. Choose items that can hold the weight of the melted cheese without falling apart.

1. Bread Options

Crusty French bread cut into bite-sized cubes works perfectly. Day-old bread is actually better because it is firmer. Sourdough bread adds a tangy flavor that complements the cheese. Pretzel pieces and breadsticks also work well.

2. Vegetables

Blanched broccoli and cauliflower hold cheese well and add nutrition. Cherry tomatoes provide a fresh, acidic contrast. Bell pepper strips in different colors look beautiful and taste great. Mushrooms and asparagus spears are also excellent choices.

3. Fruits

Tart apples like Granny Smith cut into wedges work surprisingly well. Pears also complement cheese fondue nicely. The fruit's acidity balances the rich cheese.

4. Proteins

Cooked chicken or turkey cut into cubes adds substance to the meal. Small meatballs work well too. Some people enjoy cooked shrimp or sausage pieces.

5. Other Options

Boiled small potatoes are traditional in Swiss fondue. Pickles and cornichons provide a nice acidic bite. Crackers work but choose sturdy ones that will not break.

Tips to Make Cheese Fondue

Following these helpful tips will ensure your cheese fondue recipe turns out perfect every time. Small details can make a big difference in the final result.

1. Use the Right Equipment

A proper fondue pot with a heat source keeps the cheese at the perfect temperature. If you do not have one, use a heavy-bottomed saucepan and transfer to a slow cooker on warm setting.

2. Grate Cheese Fresh

Pre-grated cheese often has anti-caking agents that prevent smooth melting. Always grate your own cheese right before cooking for the best texture.

3. Control the Heat

Keep the heat low throughout the cooking process. High heat will cause the cheese to separate and become grainy. The fondue should barely bubble.

4. Add Cheese Gradually

Never dump all the cheese in at once. Add it slowly, one handful at a time, stirring constantly. This prevents lumps and ensures smooth melting.

5. Stir Properly

Use a figure-eight stirring pattern rather than circular motions. Move your spoon or whisk in the shape of the number 8, crossing through the center of the pot each time. This technique helps incorporate the cheese more evenly and prevents the fondue from sticking to the bottom of the pot.

6. Choose Good Wine

Use a wine you would drink, not cooking wine. The flavor will concentrate as the alcohol cooks off. Dry white wines work best in most cheese fondue recipes.

How to Store the Leftover

Leftover cheese fondue can be saved and enjoyed later if you store it correctly. Proper storage keeps the texture and flavor as good as possible.

Refrigerator storage: Let the fondue cool completely before transferring it to an airtight container. Store in the refrigerator for up to 3 days. The fondue will become thick and solid when cold.

Reheating methods: Add a splash of white wine or milk when reheating to restore the creamy texture. Heat slowly over low heat, stirring constantly. You can also reheat in the microwave using 30-second intervals, stirring between each heating.

Freezing option: Cheese fondue can be frozen for up to 2 months, but the texture may change slightly. Thaw overnight in the refrigerator before reheating.

Creative uses: Cold leftover fondue makes an excellent grilled cheese sandwich filling. You can also use it as a sauce for vegetables or pasta. Spread it on bread for a quick cheese toast.

Safety tips: Never leave cheese fondue at room temperature for more than 2 hours. Always reheat to steaming hot before serving again. If the fondue smells sour or looks separated, throw it away.

item.title: Disney Princess Names
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
13 Disney Princess Names List with Pictures and Their Unique Characters

13 Disney Princess Names List with Pictures and Their Unique Characters

In the magical world of Disney, there is a beautiful lineup of beloved princesses.

Each princess has her unique charm and charming story. It ranges from the classical elegance of Cinderella to the underwater wonders of Ariel. These Disney princesses have won the hearts of millions worldwide. In this article, we'll look at the Disney Princess names list. We will also explore the surprising depths of their characters that may shock you.

Let's check out some of the Disney Princess names, compiled from numerous sources, on Monday (11/09/2023).

1. Snow White

Despite her innocence and kindness, Snow White has incredible strength. She survives the wicked queen and goes on with her life. She finds solace and friendship in the group of seven charming dwarfs. Her unwavering optimism and purity serve as an inspiration for us all.

Photo: flickr/drj1828

Beyond her iconic glass slippers, Cinderella shows incredible grace and kindness. Her ability to stay kind-hearted despite the unfairness of her stepmother and stepsisters. It is proof of the power of inner strength and resilience.

2. Cinderella (Ella)

3. Aurora

Aurora is also known as Sleeping Beauty or Briar Rose. She shows patience and grace.

Despite falling under a sleeping curse, she stays calm, waiting for true love's kiss to awaken her. Her character represents a timeless belief in the power of love's awakening.

Disney Princess Names List

4. Ariel

Ariel's adventurous spirit and decision to explore the human world are inspiring.

Her willingness to take risks, even if it means giving up her voice. This reminds us to follow our dreams, no matter the obstacles.

Disney Princess Names List

Belle's love of books and her brave spirit challenge traditional gender roles. She values intellect and inner beauty over appearances. She teaches us that true love goes beyond the surface.

5. Belle

7. Tiana

Tiana is a hardworking waitress-turned-princess. She is a symbol of determination and ambition. She unwaveringly searches for her dream of opening a restaurant in "The Princess and the Frog." She reminds us of the value of hard work and dedication in achieving our goals.

8. Mulan

Mulan's brave in masking herself as a man to save her family and country. Her struggles are awe-inspiring.

Her journey challenges gender norms and highlights the power of individual strength and resilience.

9. Merida

Merida is the independent and headstrong princess in "Brave." She refuses to conform to tradition.

Her decision to shape her destiny and fix her fractured relationship with her mother. This story speaks to the importance of self-discovery and family bonds.

Photo: flickr/Izzy Alexander aka Md Iskandar Jr

10. Pocahontas

Pocahontas represents the spirit of nature and unity. Her connection with the natural world and her efforts to bridge the gap between her people and immigrants.

This reminds us of the importance of respecting and keeping the environment. Also, embrace cultural diversity.

Photo: instagram/thedisneyprincesses

Rapunzel's adventurous spirit and endless curiosity about the world outside her tower are captivating. Her journey teaches us the transformative power of stepping out of our comfort zones. Plus, the power of embracing the unknown.

11. Rapunzel

12. Moana

Moana's decision to save her people by navigating the open ocean.

It is inspiring proof of bravery and leadership. Her unwavering belief in herself and her ability to confront challenges head-on. This story serves as a powerful message of empowerment.

13. Raya

Raya is the warrior princess from "Raya and the Last Dragon." She showcases strength and the importance of trust.

Her quest to reunite the divided lands of Kumandra teaches us the value of unity and the power of partnership.

Disney Princess Names

The Disney Princess names list presents a magnificent journey. These through a realm of courage, resilience, and empowerment.

These princesses are more than just fairy tale figures; they are symbols of strength and individuality. They continue to inspire audiences of all ages. Each Disney princess' name offers a unique lesson in character and determination. These characters have the power to amaze us with their depth and inspire us to embrace our inner strength to shape our destinies. Disney princesses truly illustrate the magic of storytelling and the timeless values that resonate with us all.

item.title: Swimming
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
50 Swimming Quotes that Make you Feel the splash

Whether you're a competitive swimmer or someone who enjoys a casual swim, let these words inspire you to dive in, push your limits, and embrace the transformative power of Swimming. (Photo by StockCake-Synchronized Swimming Display)

50 Swimming Quotes that Make You Feel the splash

Swimming is more than just a sport; it's a journey through water that invigorates the body and soul.

Whether you're a competitive swimmer or enjoy a leisurely dip, these 55 short swimming quotes will inspire and remind you of the joy of being in the water.

1. "Just keep swimming." - Dory, Finding Nemo

2. "Water is the driving force of all nature." - Leonardo da Vinci

3. "I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship." - Louisa May Alcott

4. "The water is your friend. You don't have to fight with water, just share the same spirit as the water." - Aleksandr Popov

5. "Swimming is normal for me. I'm relaxed. I'm comfortable, and I know my surroundings. It's my home." - Michael Phelps

6. "I concentrate on preparing to swim my race and let the other swimmers think about me, not me about them." - Amanda Beard

7. "Swimming is simply moving meditation." - Cesar Nikko Caharian


8. "You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get." - Michael Phelps

9. "I think that everything is possible as long as you put your mind to it and you put the work and time into it." - Michael Phelps

10. "The man who is swimming against the stream knows the strength of it." - Woodrow Wilson

11. "Swimming is a confusing sport, because sometimes you do it for fun, and other times you do it to not die." - Demetri Martin

Swimming Quotes

12. "If you want to learn to swim jump into the water. On dry land no frame of mind is ever going to help you." - Bruce Lee

13. "Don't be a fish; be a frog. Swim in the water and jump when you hit ground." - Kim Young-ha

14. "Only when the tide goes out do you discover who's been swimming naked." - Warren Buffett


15. "Swim upstream. Go the other way. Ignore the conventional wisdom." - Sam Walton

16. "The joy of surfing is so many things combined, from the physical exertion of it, to the challenge of it, to the mental side of the sport." - Kelly Slater

Swimming Quotes

17. "All good writing is swimming under water and holding your breath." - F. Scott Fitzgerald


18. "I grew up watching 'Jaws,' and that shark was massive! And I remember diving as a kid, seeing great whites, Tiger sharks, Bull sharks, and being utterly terrified." - Chris Hemsworth

19. "Swimming for me is amazing because the pool is quiet." - Michael Phelps

20. "If one synchronized swimmer drowns, do all the rest have to drown too?" - Steven Wright

21. "I love the ocean. I've always liked the blue, so tranquil and peaceful and gliding. And the fear of it." - Siouxsie Sioux

22. "I'm an actor, not a star. Stars are people who live in Hollywood and have heart-shaped swimming pools." - Al Pacino


23. "Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air." - Ralph Waldo Emerson

24. "Swimming is probably the ultimate of burnout sports." - Diana Nyad

25. "I understand that when you dive into the water, you inevitably crash into it and become it." - Taiye Selasi

26. "I believe that God always has a plan. Life is never easy, and I've been through a lot of tough times. But God has always been there for me." - Ryan Lochte27. "Swimming isn't everything, winning is." - Mark Spitz28. "The water is your friend. You don't have to fight with water, just share the same spirit as the water, and it will help you move." - Aleksandr Popov

29. "I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship." - Louisa May Alcott


30. "You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water." - Rabindranath Tagore

31. "To have faith is to trust yourself to the water. When you swim you don't grab hold of the water, because if you do you will sink and drown. Instead you relax, and float." - Alan Watts

32. "If you're going through hell, keep going." - Winston Churchill

33. "The best way to observe a fish is to become a fish." - Jacques Cousteau

34. "I'm not saying I'm going to rule the world, or I'm going to change the world, but I guarantee you that I will spark the brain that will change the world." - Tupac Shakur

35. "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." - Winston Churchill


36. "The important thing is not being afraid to take a chance. Remember, the greatest failure is to not try." - Debbi Fields

37. "You miss 100% of the shots you don't take." - Wayne Gretzky

38. "The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination." - Tommy Lasorda

39. "Believe you can and you're halfway there." - Theodore Roosevelt

Swimming Quotes

40. "I'm not afraid of dying. I'm afraid of not trying." - Jay-Z

41. "Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going." - Sam Levenson

42. "The only way to do great work is to love what you do." - Steve Jobs

43. "Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to Success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful." - Albert Schweitzer

44. "The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be." - Ralph Waldo Emerson

45. "I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work." - Thomas A. Edison

46. "The secret of getting ahead is getting started." - Mark Twain

47. "It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up." - Vince Lombardi

48. "The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today." - Franklin D. Roosevelt49. "Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking." - William Butler Yeats50. "The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing." - Walt Disney

51. "It always seems impossible until it's done." - Nelson Mandela


52. "Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world." - Roy T. Bennett

53. "The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible." - Charles Kingsleigh

54. "Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart." - Roy T. Bennett

55. "The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall." - Nelson Mandela

Swimming Quotes

These swimming quotes encapsulate the essence of determination, perseverance, and the sheer joy of being in the water. Whether you're a competitive swimmer or someone who enjoys a casual swim, let these words inspire you to dive in, push your limits, and embrace the transformative power of Swimming.

item.title: Beautiful
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
8 Most Beautiful Beach Female Tennis Players

Their charm and elegance bring an extra layer to their public personas.
(Photo by Anastasia Nagibina on Pexels)

8 Most Beautiful Beach Female Tennis Players

Tennis is a sport that combines skill, athleticism, and glamour. Many female tennis players excel on the court and capture attention for their beauty, especially when they are seen at the beach.


In this article, we will explore eight of the most beautiful beach female tennis players who have made waves both in sports and the fashion world. Each of these athletes brings their unique style and charm to the game.

Most Beautiful Beach Female Tennis Players

1. Maria Sharapova

A former world number one player, Maria Sharapova is famous for her incredible talent and striking beauty.

Her long legs and graceful figure make her a standout at the beach. Maria often shares pictures from her seaside vacations, where she enjoys the sun and sand.

2. Ana Ivanovic

The Serbian tennis star, known for her powerful backhand, has also made a mark with her stunning looks. With a radiant smile and elegant presence, Ana often shares beautiful beach moments on her social media. She showcased her love for tennis and the ocean.

3. Anna Kournikova

Although she has retired from professional tennis, Anna Kournikova remains a symbol of beauty in sports. She is known for her athletic body and captivating smile. Anna often shares beach photos highlighting her fun-loving spirit and connection to the ocean.

4. Garbiñe Muguruza

This talented Spanish player combines elegance with athleticism. Garbiñe’s stunning features and confident demeanor shine through in her beach photos, where she enjoys the sun while maintaining her fierce competitive spirit.

5. Sorana Cirstea

Romanian tennis player Sorana Cirstea is known for her impressive court skills and striking beauty.

With her long hair and captivating eyes, Sorana often shares beach moments that show her playful side and love for the outdoors.

6. Eugenie Bouchard

The Canadian tennis sensation, Eugenie Bouchard has won fans.

She is famous for her talent and her stunning looks. Her beach photos capture her fun personality and love for life, making her a favorite among tennis fans and fashion enthusiasts.

7. Fanny Stollár

The young Hungarian player, Fanny Stollár, is rising in tennis. She also gained attention for her beauty. With a fresh and youthful appearance, she often shares vibrant beach moments on social media. Those features reflect her cheerful disposition and passion for the sport.

8. Anastasia Detiuc

This talented player from Moldova is known for her skills on the court and striking appearance. Anastasia often showcases her love for the beach through photos highlighting her athletic build and charming smile. These traits make her a favorite among fans.

These female tennis players excel in their sport and delight audiences with their beauty, especially when they are enjoying time at the beach.


Each brings a unique style and personality that resonates with fans worldwide.

These amazing athletes are known for their achievements on the tennis court. They also embody a sense of style and grace that shines through in various settings, particularly at the beach. Their charm and elegance bring an extra layer to their public personas.

Most Beautiful Beach Female Tennis Players

item.title: Places To Visit In Himachal Pradesh
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
6 Romantic Places To Visit In Himachal Pradesh For Honeymoon

6 Romantic Places To Visit In Himachal Pradesh For Honeymoon

Are you looking for the perfect romantic getaway for your honeymoon? Look no further than the beautiful hills of Himachal Pradesh!

With its stunning natural beauty and serene atmosphere, Himachal Pradesh is the ideal destination for newlyweds to celebrate their love.

There are countless places to visit in Himachal Pradesh that offer romantic settings and breathtaking views, making it a popular choice for couples seeking a memorable honeymoon experience.

From the snow-capped mountains to the lush green valleys, Himachal Pradesh is a paradise for nature lovers and adventure seekers alike. Whether you want to enjoy a quiet, intimate moment with your partner or partake in thrilling outdoor activities together, this charming state has something for everyone.

In this article, we will explore the best, romantic places to visit in Himachal Pradesh for honeymoon, according to various sources, Tuesday (16/1/2024). Get ready to turn your honeymoon into the most memorable time in your life.

1. Shimla

Shimla is everyone's favorite destination. Known for its picturesque views, pleasant weather, and old-world charm, it's a perfect destination for honeymooners.

The scenic hill station offers a romantic setting for couples with its lush green valleys, snow-capped mountains, and charming colonial architecture.

Some famous attractions in Shimla for couples include the historic Ridge Road, where you can enjoy a leisurely stroll while taking in the stunning scenery. The Mall Road is another popular spot, offering a variety of shops, cafes, and restaurants for couples to explore together.

Overall, Shimla's natural beauty and romantic ambiance make it a top choice for honeymooners looking to create special memories together.

2. Dalhousie

Dalhousie is a very famous hill station in Himachal Pradesh. It is a perfect place for couples to go on a romantic honeymoon. The town is surrounded by stunning mountains and lush greenery, creating a serene and peaceful atmosphere.

Some famous attractions in Dalhousie include the stunning Khajjiar Lake, also known as the Mini Switzerland of India, and the charming Kalatop Wildlife Sanctuary for nature lovers. The Rang Mahal and St. John's Church are also worth a visit for their historical and architectural significance.

With its serene atmosphere and breathtaking views of the Himalayas, Dalhousie provides the ideal backdrop for a romantic honeymoon. Couples can enjoy leisurely walks, scenic drives, and peaceful moments together in this idyllic hill station.

Whether it's exploring the natural beauty, indulging in delicious local cuisine, or simply relaxing in each other's company, Dalhousie offers a memorable and enchanting experience for newlyweds.

3. Kasauli

Kasauli, a serene hill station in Himachal Pradesh, is the perfect place for a honeymoon. The tranquil environment, cool weather, and breathtaking views make it an ideal romantic getaway for couples.

Kasauli

Kasauli has some must-visit attractions for couples. One is Monkey Point, which has panoramic views of mountains and greenery. Another is Christ Church, known for its colonial architecture and peaceful atmosphere. The Lover's Lane is another popular spot for couples to enjoy a leisurely stroll amidst the pine trees and enjoy the scenic beauty.

Kasauli's charming atmosphere and romantic setting make it an unforgettable destination for honeymooners, offering a perfect blend of natural beauty and tranquility.

Manali is another famous destination for newlyweds in Himachal Pradesh. The breathtaking views of the Himalayas, lush greenery, and tranquil atmosphere make it an ideal spot for couples looking to escape the hustle and bustle of city life.

4. Manali

Manali has many great attractions for couples. You can enjoy snow activities at Rohtang Pass. The beautiful Hadimba Devi Temple is tranquil and scenic. The stunning Manu Temple offers a serene and spiritual experience.

Additionally, Solang Valley is a must-visit for adventure-loving couples. It offers a range of thrilling activities, such as paragliding and zorbing. The Vashisht Hot Water Springs are also popular for a relaxing and romantic experience.

With its stunning natural beauty and range of activities, Manali is sure to provide a magical and memorable honeymoon experience for couples.

Kullu, a charming town in Himachal Pradesh, is the perfect destination for couples looking for a romantic honeymoon getaway. Nestled amidst the stunning Himalayan mountains, this picturesque town offers a serene and peaceful ambiance, ideal for newlyweds to celebrate their love.

5. Kullu

One of the most famous attractions in Kullu is the Raghunath Temple, which is dedicated to Lord Rama. Its intricate architecture and religious significance make it a must-visit for couples seeking spiritual experiences.

Another popular spot is the Great Himalayan National Park, where couples can enjoy a peaceful nature walk and take in the breathtaking views of the surrounding landscapes.

With its beautiful surroundings and a variety of attractions to explore, Kullu is an ideal destination for couples to create unforgettable memories on their honeymoon.

6. Spiti Valley

Nestled in the beautiful state of Himachal Pradesh, Spiti Valley is the perfect destination for a romantic honeymoon. Its stunning landscapes and peaceful atmosphere make it an ideal spot for couples looking to celebrate their love.

Spiti Valley

Spiti Valley offers a wide range of attractions for couples. Some of the most famous attractions are the ancient Key Monastery, the picturesque Chandratal Lake, and the enchanting Dhankar Lake. These spots are perfect for romantic strolls, taking in the breathtaking views, and creating lasting memories together.

With its unique blend of tranquility and romance, it's no wonder that Spiti Valley is becoming an increasingly popular choice for couples seeking a special and intimate getaway.

item.title: Fast and Furious Quotes
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
Fast and Furious Quotes: The Best Lines from Dominic Toretto and the Gang

Fast and Furious quotes cover themes of loyalty, family, and adrenaline-fueled adventure. (Photo by Printerval01 on Pinterest)

Fast and Furious Quotes: The Best Lines from Dominic Toretto and the Gang

The “Fast and Furious” franchise has thrilled audiences for more than two decades.

But it's not just the high-speed racing and jaw-dropping stunts that make these films legendary. This is also because the unforgettable dialogues delivered by the characters in this movie.

That’s why we present you a collection of Fast and Furious quotes to bring you into the thrilling world of fast cars, street racing and unforgettable friendships.

"Fast and Furious" is a movie that follows a group of skilled drivers, led by Dominic Toretto and his close-knit crew.

They navigate a dangerous world of crime and betrayal.

Along the way, they form an alliance, face powerful enemies, and embark on a daring mission to protect their loved ones and seek justice.

Fast and Furious quotes cover themes of loyalty, family, and adrenaline-fueled adventure.

So get ready as we explore some of the best quotes from Dominic Toretto and his fearless team of drivers. Don’t miss out!

A. Fast and Furious Quotes from Dominic Toretto

1. “I live my life a quarter-mile at a time. Nothing else matters not the mortgage, not the store, not my team, and all their bullshit. For those ten seconds or less, I’m free.”

2. “The most important thing in life will always be the people in this room. Right here, right now. Salute, mi familia.”

3. “You break her heart, I’ll break your neck.”

4. "You ride, I ride. You fight, I fight."

5. "You don't turn your back on family, even when they do."

6. "I don't need luck; I've got family."

7. "I owe you a 10-second car."

8. “I watched my father burn to death. I can still remember him screaming. The people who were there said my father died long before the tanks blew. They said it was me that was screaming.”

9. "You break her heart, I'll break your neck."

10. "Ask any racer, any real racer. It don't matter if you win by an inch or a mile; winning's winning."

B. Fast and Furious Quotes from Brian O’Connor

1. “So, Dunn looks like we’re gonna be partners, bro. Could you tell me right quick what would be a better motor for my Skyline, a Gallo 12 or a Gallo 24?”

2. “Dude I Almost Had You!”

3. “I’ll have the tuna. No crust.”

4. “Just don’t cheat this time.”

5. “Hey, we do what we do best. We improvise, all right?”

6. “Yeah, Rome! How Do Ya Like Them Apples?!”

7. "I used to drag here back in high school."

8. "It's not how you stand by your car; it's how you race your car."

9. "Nice car. What's the retail on one of those?"

10. "One car in exchange for knowing what a man's made of? That's a price I can live with."

C. Fast and Furious Quotes from Other Characters

1. “Look at all those people down there. They follow the rules for what? They’re letting fear lead them.” – Han

2. “There’s an old saying: ‘For want of a nail, the horseshoe was lost. For want of a horseshoe, the steed was lost. For want of a steed, the message was not delivered. For want of an undelivered message, the war was lost.’” – Uncle Kamata

3. “You guys really think you’ve won. This code you live by, it’s the very reason why you weren’t even in the game.” – Owen Shaw

4. “Life’s simple. You make choices and you don’t look back.” – Han

5. “What’d you expect? You didn’t just play with fire, you soaked the matches in gasoline.” - Han

6. “You know what, I’m starting to like this country already.” – Sean

7. “You don’t get it, do you? You have nowhere else to go! If it doesn’t work out here, you’re going to jail, you get that?! This isn’t a game. And I’m gonna tell you one more time, if you’re gonna live under my roof, you’re gonna go by my rules or get out. Understand? Understand?!” – Major Boswell

8. “That’s funny. From a guy who took the oath of a cop, then went against everything it stood for, for some wannabe tough-guy prick who beat a man half to death with a socket wrench. Yeah, real tough. You turn around and put your hands behind your back.” – Hobbs

9. “Maybe you’re lying to yourself. Maybe you’re not the good guy pretending to be a bad guy. Maybe you’re the bad guy pretending to be the good guy. You ever think about that?” – Mia

10. “Why don’t you girls just pack it up before I leave tread marks on your face?” – Letty Ortiz

item.title: Home Alone
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
'Home Alone' Star Daniel Stern Leaves Hollywood, Had Quiet Life on a Farm

Daniel Stern, best known as Marv in Home Alone, has stepped away from Hollywood to embrace a quieter life on his farm in Ventura, California.

In a recent TikTok video, he shared details about his new lifestyle. He seems to be raising cattle and growing tangerines. Stern mentioned that he juices the tangerines, freezes the juice, and gives it to friends.

Stern, now 67, has focused on farming and pursued his passion for art. He showcased a sculpture he was working on, receiving positive feedback from fans surprised by his artistic talent.

Despite his success in the film industry, Stern has expressed gratitude for the chance to live a more peaceful life away from the spotlight.

Stern revealed that he has not watched Home Alone since its premiere in 1990. But he knows the script very well.

He reminisced about his experiences on set and how much joy the film has brought to families over the years. In addition to his farming and sculpting life, Stern released a memoir, Home and Alone, reflecting on his career and life choices.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Daniel Stern (@realdanielstern)

item.title: most beautiful college campuses
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
Top 10 Most Beautiful College Campuses in the World

Top 10 Most Beautiful College Campuses in the World

When choosing a college, students often think about the education and courses offered. But there's something else that can make a college special—the beauty of its campus.

Many universities around the world are known for their stunning architecture, beautiful landscapes, and historic buildings. These campuses don't just offer a great place to study but also provide a peaceful and inspiring environment.

Here is a list of ten of the most beautiful college campuses in the world. These schools are not only known for their academics but also for their breathtaking surroundings.

1. Trinity College, Ireland

Trinity College is one of Ireland's oldest and most beautiful colleges. Its famous Long Room in the Old Library has over 200,000 books, including the famous Book of Kells. The campus is a must-visit for history and literature lovers.

2. University of Bologna, Italy

The University of Bologna is the oldest university in the world that still works today. Its campus combines old and new buildings with beautiful courtyards and historic places like Piazza Maggiore.

3. Cornell University, United States

Located in Ithaca, New York, Cornell University is known for its pretty campus. The mix of Gothic and Romanesque styles includes beautiful buildings like the Cornell Library and the Sage Chapel, set amidst scenic lakes and waterfalls.

4. University of Salamanca, Spain

The University of Salamanca is one of Europe's oldest universities. Its campus is a UNESCO World Heritage Site, featuring beautiful Gothic architecture, especially the Casa de las Conchas with intricate stone carvings.

5. University of Otago, New Zealand

Located in Dunedin, New Zealand, the University of Otago boasts stunning Victorian architecture. The campus features beautiful buildings like the Clock Tower and Registry Building, adorned with intricate stone carvings and stained glass windows.

6. Royal Roads University, Canada

Situated in Victoria, British Columbia, Royal Roads University offers a unique waterfront setting. The campus features modern architecture blending seamlessly with its natural surroundings, including the historic Hatley Castle.

7. University of Cambridge, England

The University of Cambridge is renowned for its stunning architecture. The iconic King's College Chapel is a highlight, along with other historic colleges like Trinity College and St. John's College, which are known for their beautiful buildings and gardens.

8. University of Oxford, England

The University of Oxford is another prestigious institution with historic colleges like Christ Church and Brasenose College. The Bodleian Library, one of Europe's oldest libraries, is also a major attraction.

9. Flagler College, United States

Located in St. Augustine, Florida, Flagler College features beautiful Spanish-style architecture. The Ponce de Leon Hall, originally a luxury hotel, is now part of the campus, surrounded by scenic gardens and a waterfront.

10. University of Sydney, Australia

The University of Sydney boasts stunning sandstone buildings in a mix of Gothic and Romanesque styles. The Quadrangle, featuring several historic buildings and a beautiful courtyard, is particularly noteworthy for its architectural beauty.

item.title: Suprising Facts About Colosseum
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
7 Surprising Facts About The Colosseum You May Never Know

Who doesn't know about the Colosseum? Standing right in the heart of Rome, it's been the city's icon for thousands of years. But deeper than its structure, it hides many mysteries and exciting stories waiting to be discovered.

7 Surprising Facts About The Colosseum You May Never Know

In this article, we have gathered some fun facts about the Colosseum from various sources, Friday (13/10/2023).

Let's uncover some interesting stories behind the Colosseum and discover what makes it so special!

Have you ever wondered when the Colosseum was built? This gigantic structure was built in 72 A.D. It means the Colosseum is almost 2,000 years old! It was made under the order of Emperor Vespasian, one of the most successful Roman emperors.

1. It Was Almost 2,000 Years Old

2. It Takes 8 Years To Finished

You might think such a huge place would take forever to build, especially with their limited technology. Surprisingly, it was finished in just eight years. That's pretty quick for something this grand.

3. Colosseum Is Not Its Real Name

Today, people all around the world know it as the Colosseum. However, "Colosseum" is not its real name. The original name of the building is "Flavian Amphitheatre." It's named after its initiator, Titus Flavius Vespasianus, or Emperor Vespasian.

Roman Wooden Crane

5. It Used Wooden Cranes To Lift The Stones

When we see the Colosseum, one of the first questions that comes to mind is how they lift the heavy stones? According to the Little Rock School District, the Romans invented wooden cranes to raise big, heavy stone blocks.

The Colosseum is proof of the advanced engineering of the Roman Empire. This gigantic amphitheater even had a retractable roof! On hot days, they used a big shade cover called a "velarium" to keep the people sitting in the high seats cooler.

6. It Had A Retractable Roof

Sailors from the Roman Navy, who were stationed up high in the Colosseum's walls, were the ones in charge of putting this shade up.

7. It Also Had Elevators

Elevator is another advanced technology in the Colosseum. It once had 24 elevators to transport animals, such as lions, leopards, and wolves, from underground to the arena above. These elevators were operated manually by men.

item.title: frog
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
Resident Held 'Frog Wedding,' Pray for Rain Amid Heatwave

They mate with male and female frogs in the hope of bringing rain.

Indian Resident Held 'Frog Wedding,' Pray for Rain Amid Heatwave

North India faces extreme heat waves.

People in Varanasi turned to a unique tradition to pray for rain: a frog wedding.

They married a male and female frog, hoping to bring rain and relief from the scorching temperatures.

User @ghantaa shared this moment on social media, and the video spread quickly.

It showed the frog couple under a red cloth, as reported by Indian Express.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by ghantaa (@ghantaa)

The Wedding

A priest led the ceremony, surrounded by a crowd of excited locals. The event was full of life with prayers, rituals, and traditional songs sung by local women.

An Instagram user wrote, "This is common in rural India. Why not honor their traditions?"

Another said, "A new marriage opens."

Another joked, "We did frog weddings before GTA 6."

Frog marriage is known as "bhekuli biya" in Assamese. It is a traditional practice in Assam.

According to an old poem, the sound of frogs is believed to bring rain.

The poem says that farmers asked the clouds why there was no rain, and the clouds replied that there would be no rain without the sound of frogs.

This is because the rainy season overlaps with the frogs' mating period.

Frogs' voices are thought to be called rain.

item.title: iphone 15
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
Russian Company Makes Diamond-Studded Version of iPhone 15

Russian Company Makes Diamond-Studded Version of iPhone 15

Caviar, a Russian luxury device customization company, recently announced its latest custom product, the iPhone Diamond Snowflake.

The company specializes in making custom devices with luxurious designs. It has even announced the iPhone Diamond Snowflake version of the yet-to-be-launched iPhone 15.

The unveiled iPhone 15 is predicted to be the most expensive iPhone ever made. With Caviar's luxurious design, the price of this mobile device made by the Apple company will be even more fantastic.

Diamond Snowflake was designed by the Russian luxury device customization company.

This exclusive version of Apple's latest gadget features a custom case made of 18-carat white gold whose surface is studded with no less than 570 diamonds.

Customers who purchase the iPhone 15 Diamond Snowflake will also receive a Graff Snowflake necklace pendant made by renowned British jeweler Graff. The pendant itself is made of platinum-white gold with embedded diamonds. The price of this handcrafted masterpiece is $562,700.

Caviar originally designed the Diamond Snowflake variant for the iPhone 14 and iPhone 14 Max. But the price tag for the iPhone 14 and iPhone 14 Max versions is "only" $533,000.

The soon-to-be-launched iPhone 15 version is the most expensive to date

The iPhone 15 Diamond Snowflake will also be the most expensive iPhone ever.

Customers should not expect spec upgrades Like all Caviar custom phones. This is because the customization process carried out by Caviar is purely decorative.

But if exclusivity is important, there's no better choice than the iPhone 15 Diamond Snowflake. It is not yet clear how many units the company will make. But if previous generations are any indication, it's unlikely there will be more than three units of the Phone 15 Diamond Snowflake.

Over the years, Caviar has created some of the most expensive phones. Like Tyrannophone, an iPhone 13 Pro with real T-Rex teeth embedded inside.

What exactly is skin care?

item.title: bad habits
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
8 Bad Habits That Can Ruin Your Mental Health

Your daily habits shape how you feel about yourself and the world around you. Small actions you do every day can make you feel happy and strong, or they can make you feel tired and sad. Many people do not realize how much their habits affect their mental health.

Some habits seem normal or even helpful at first. You might think you are being productive or taking care of yourself. But these habits can slowly hurt your mind and emotions without you noticing. They build up over time and make it harder to feel good about life.

If you want to improve your mental health, here are eight bad habits you should avoid:

1. Perfectionism

You want everything to be perfect all the time. You set very high standards for yourself and feel bad when you cannot reach them. This habit makes you afraid to try new things because you worry about making mistakes. Perfectionism creates stress and anxiety because nothing is ever good enough. It stops you from enjoying your achievements and makes you focus only on what went wrong.

2. Lack of Exercise

When you do not move your body enough, your mental health suffers. Exercise helps your brain make chemicals that make you feel happy and calm. Without regular movement, you may feel more stressed, anxious, or sad. Your energy levels drop, and you may have trouble sleeping. Even a short walk each day can help improve your mood and make you feel more positive about life.

3. "I'll Do It Later" Mindset

Putting off important tasks creates stress and guilt in your mind. When you delay things, they pile up and become harder to manage. This habit makes you feel overwhelmed and out of control. You worry about the things you need to do, but you keep avoiding them. The longer you wait, the worse you feel about yourself and your ability to handle responsibilities.

4. Not Sleep Enough

Sleep is when your brain repairs itself and processes the day's events. Without enough sleep, you cannot think clearly or control your emotions well. You become more irritable, anxious, and sad. Your memory gets worse, and simple tasks feel much harder. Poor sleep also makes it difficult to deal with stress and can lead to more serious mental health problems over time.

5. Negative Thinking

Always focusing on bad things that might happen or dwelling on past mistakes hurts your mental health. Negative thinking creates a cycle where you expect the worst and feel hopeless about the future. This habit makes you see problems everywhere, even when things are going well. It drains your energy and makes it hard to enjoy good moments in your life.

6. Chronically Online

Spending too much time on social media and the internet can damage your mental health. You start comparing your life to others and feel like you are not good enough. Online arguments and negative news make you feel anxious and angry. This habit takes time away from real relationships and activities that make you happy. It also hurts your sleep and makes you feel isolated from the real world.

7. Unhealthy Diet

What you eat affects how your brain works and how you feel. Too much sugar, processed food, and caffeine can make you feel anxious and moody. Skipping meals makes your blood sugar drop, which affects your emotions and thinking. A poor diet also makes you feel tired and sluggish. When you do not give your body the right nutrients, your mental health suffers along with your physical health.

8. Multitasking

Trying to do many things at once makes you feel stressed and overwhelmed. Your brain cannot focus properly when it jumps between different tasks. This leads to more mistakes and lower quality work, which makes you feel frustrated. Multitasking also makes you feel like you never finish anything completely. It prevents you from being present in the moment and enjoying what you are doing.

item.title: toothpicks
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
Video of Eating Fried Toothpicks Goes Viral in South Korea

Video of Eating Fried Toothpicks Goes Viral in South Korea

A video of eating fried toothpicks is going viral in South Korea.

The toothpicks referred to here are certainly not toothpicks made of wood or bamboo.

In South Korea, most toothpicks are made of starch or corn starch.

However, South Korea's Ministry of Food and Drug Safety quickly alerted the public not to eat the fried toothpicks shaped like French fries.

The ministry posted on social media platform X on Wednesday (24/1) that "their safety as food has not been verified".

Previously, videos showing toothpicks, a sanitary product, being fried in oil and eaten went viral in South Korea.

Video clips showing people eating toothpicks with seasonings such as powdered cheese have received thousands of likes and shares on TikTok and Instagram.

The toothpicks are green in color due to food coloring.

Often used in restaurants in South Korea, these toothpicks can also be utilized to pick up small food items.

Online eating shows called "Mukbang, " which often feature people eating extreme amounts or unusual dishes, are viral in South Korea.

@nbcnews

South Korea is urging people not to eat fried toothpicks made of starch in a shape resembling curly fries, after videos of the practice were widely shared on social media.

♬ original sound - nbcnews

"This is so crunchy," a TikTok user said while chewing on a fried toothpick in a video.

However, the South Korean government has asked its people not to consume the devices.

"Please don't eat them," South Korea's Ministry of Food and Drug Safety said, as quoted by Reuters.

item.title: tips to boost dog appetite
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
9 Tips to Boost Your Dog's Appetite

9 Tips to Boost Your Dog's Appetite

If your dog is not eating well, it can be a concern.

Poor appetite can lead to health issues and weight loss. There are many reasons that can cause a dog to stop eating, like stress, boredom with food, or health problems.

Luckily, there are simple steps to help your furry friend eat more. Here are some tips to boost your dog's appetite.

1. Make a Strict Feeding Schedule

Dogs like routine. Feed your dog at the same times every day, two or three times a day. This helps your dog know when to expect food. If your dog doesn’t eat within 15-30 minutes, remove the food and try again at the next meal.

2. Add Tasty Mix-Ins

Plain dog food can be boring. Add tasty mix-ins like cooked chicken, beef, or fish. Low-sodium broth or a bit of canned dog food can also help. Just make sure the mix-ins are safe for dogs.

3. Reduce Treats

Too many treats can fill your dog up and reduce their appetite for meals. Limit treats to special occasions or training sessions. This can help your dog feel hungrier at mealtime.

4. Reduce Stress

Stress can make dogs lose their appetite. Create a calm environment during mealtime by keeping noise levels low and minimizing distractions. A quiet space can help your dog feel safe and ready to eat.

5. Get More Exercise

Regular exercise is important for your dog's health and can help increase their appetite. Take your dog for walks or play games in the yard. Just be careful not to overdo it, especially in hot weather.

6. Change Food Types

If your dog is not interested in their food, try changing it. Experiment with different brands or flavors. Switch from dry to wet food, or vice versa. Introduce new food gradually to avoid stomach upset.

7. Warm the Food

Warming your dog's food can make it smell better and more appetizing. Heat it slightly in the microwave for a few seconds, but make sure it’s not too hot before serving. A warm meal can entice your dog to eat.

8. Make a Comfortable Eating Environment

The eating area matters. Make sure it is clean, quiet, and free from distractions. Use a comfortable bowl that suits your dog’s size. A cozy environment can encourage your dog to enjoy their meals.

9. Try Hand Feeding

Hand feeding can make your dog feel more comfortable and encourage them to eat. Sit with your dog and offer food from your hand. This can be a bonding experience and can help your dog feel safe and cared for during mealtime.

If your dog is not eating well, try these tips to boost their appetite. A strict feeding schedule, tasty mix-ins, and a comfortable eating environment can make a big difference. Be patient and give your dog time to adjust.

If these tips do not help, visit the vet. The vet can check if there is a health issue causing the loss of appetite. They can also provide medicine if needed.

item.title: Kevin Bacon Movies
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
5 Kevin Bacon Movies Horror That You Will End Up On The Dark Side

5 Kevin Bacon Movies Horror That You Will End Up On The Dark Side

Kevin Bacon is a versatile actor known for his captivating performances.

Bacon has left an indelible mark on various film genres, including horror. Brace yourself for a journey into fear as we explore five Kevin Bacon movies that will lead you to the dark side.

At the top of our list is the cult classic "Tremors." It is a horror sci-fi film that sees Kevin Bacon as Valentine McKee.

1. Tremors (1990)

In the small town of Perfection, Nevada, Bacon's character is set alongside Fred Ward, Reba McEntire, and Finn Carter.

This movie discovers that the town is under siege by giant worm monsters hungry for human flesh. This thrilling ride has an impressive 88% on Rotten Tomatoes. Tremors offer a perfect blend of suspense, humor, and monster mayhem.

Kevin Bacon Movies

Where to watch:

Stream Tremors by renting or purchasing on Google Play, Amazon, iTunes, and Vudu.

In "Flatliners," Kevin Bacon is part of an ensemble cast of medical students taking a daring experiment to tell the mysteries beyond life.

2. Flatliners (1990)

Directed by Joel Schumacher, this psychological horror film explores the results of near-death experiences. Bacon's character, alongside Kiefer Sutherland and Julia Roberts.

They face paranormal repercussions as they journey into the afterlife. They make this a gripping and thought-provoking horror experience.

Kevin Bacon Movies

Where to watch: Apple TV, Amazon Video, Google Play Movies, YouTube, Microsoft Store, DIRECTV, AMC on Demand, and Vudu.

Directed by Paul Verhoeven, "Hollow Man" delves into the darker side of scientific experimentation.

3. Hollow Man (2000)

Bacon represents the brilliant yet arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine. He discovers a way to make matter invisible. As the experiments progress, the film turns horrifying, showing the consequences of meddling with the unknown. "Hollow Man" offers a unique blend of science fiction and horror, with Bacon delivering a chilling performance.

Where to watch:

Amazon Video, Google Play Movies, YouTube, Vudu, Apple TV, Microsoft Store, DIRECTV, AMC on Demand as download or rent it on Apple TV, Amazon Video, Google Play Movies, YouTube, Vudu, Microsoft Store, DIRECTV online.

Kevin Bacon Movies

4. Stir of Echoes (1999)

In this psychological horror thriller, Kevin Bacon plays the role of Tom Witzky. He is a skeptic turned psychic. "Stir of Echoes" follows Witzky's unsettling journey as he creates psychic abilities, leading him to uncover a haunting mystery surrounding a missing neighbor. With a Tomatometer score of 67%, this film combines supernatural elements with psychological suspense. This movie showcases Bacon's versatility as an actor.

Where to watch: Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV, Vudu, or buy it on Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV, Vudu.

Kevin Bacon's early career included a brush with the horror genre in the iconic "Friday the 13th." Sean S. Cunningham directed this 1980 slasher film.

5. Friday the 13th (1980)

This movie introduced audiences to the infamous character Jason Voorhees. As Jack in the film, Bacon's role contributes to the suspense and terror. It has made "Friday the 13th" a cornerstone of the horror genre.

With a Rotten Tomatoes score of 63%, this film began a legendary horror franchise.

Where to watch: Max, Prime Video, Apple TV or Vudu on your Roku device.

Kevin Bacon Movies

As you explore these Kevin Bacon movies, be prepared for a scary cinematic experience.

They showcase the actor's ability to navigate the dark realms of storytelling. Each movie offers a unique twist on horror. They making them essential viewing for fans of the genre and those ready to embrace the joy of the unknown.
