Bordeaux is a charming port city in southwestern France. The city blends history and modernity. The Place de la Bourse features a water mirror, creating interesting reflections. La Cité du Vin is a modern museum dedicated to wine culture.

Saint-André Cathedral and Tour Pey-Berland are important historical landmarks. The Grand Théâtre represents 18th-century architectural beauty.

8. Palace of Versailles

The Palace of Versailles, once a royal residence, is known for its luxury. The Hall of Mirrors is a highlight, with its chandeliers and gilded decorations.

Extensive gardens surround the palace, featuring fountains and sculptures. The Grand and Petit Trianon offer additional insights into royal life.

9. Dune du Pilat

Dune du Pilat is Europe's tallest sand dune, located on the Atlantic coast. Visitors can climb to the top for views of the ocean and pine forests. Paragliding is possible for adventure seekers.

Nearby Arcachon Bay is famous for oyster farms and beaches, offering opportunities for swimming and seafood tasting.

10. Rocamadour

Rocamadour is a village built into a cliff face. It is known for its religious significance. The Sanctuary of the Blessed Virgin Mary consists of several chapels carved into the rock.

A castle overlooks the village, providing panoramic views. Nearby attractions include the Grotte des Merveilles, featuring prehistoric paintings, and the Forêt des Singes, a monkey reserve.

item.title: Thriller Movies
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
5 Thriller Movies of the Korean 2000s

5 Thriller Movies of the Korean 2000s

Korean cinema has gained worldwide praise for its thrilling and charming storytelling, especially in the thriller genre.

In the 2000s, several standout movies left audiences on the edge of their seats with tension and excitement. Here are five must-watch thriller movies from Korea in the 2000s.

Thriller Movies

pinterest/Linh Ly

1. Memories of Murder (2003)

IMDb: 8,3
Rotten Tomatoes: 83%

"Memories of Murder" is a gripping thriller based on the true story of the first serial murders in South Korea.

With its spirited aura and unexpected twists, "Memories of Murder" keeps viewers guessing until the end. You can watch this movie on Amazon Prime Video.

Directed by Bong Joon-ho, this film follows two detectives as they investigate a series of brutal killings in a small town.

2. Oldboy (2003)

IMDb: 8,1
Rotten Tomatoes: 95%

"Oldboy" is a dark and twisted thriller that follows the story of a man.

He is mysteriously imprisoned for 15 years and then suddenly released. Directed by Park Chan-wook, this film explores themes of revenge, redemption, and the consequences of one's actions.

This Korean thriller has shocking plot twists and spectacular visuals. "Oldboy" has become a cult classic in Korean cinema. You can watch this movie on Hulu.

Thriller Movies

IMDb: 8,5
Rotten Tomatoes: 99%

"Parasite" made history as the first South Korean film to win the prestigious Palme d'Or at the "Cannes Film Festival."

3. Parasite (2019)

Directed by Bong Joon-ho, this thriller tells the story of a poor family who enters the lives of a wealthy household through trickery and manipulation. With its social commentary and unpredictable storyline, "Parasite" kept viewers on the edge. You can watch this movie on Hulu.

IMDb: 7,4
Rotten Tomatoes: 99%

"The Wailing" is a supernatural thriller. The story follows a police officer investigating a series of mysterious deaths in a small village.

4. The Wailing (2016)

Directed by Na Hong-jin, this film combines elements of horror and tension to create a chilling atmosphere. With its creepy cinematography and complex storyline, "The Wailing" is a must-watch for fans of the thriller genre. You can watch this movie on Netflix.

5. I Saw the Devil (2010)


IMDb: 7,8
Rotten Tomatoes: 81%

"I Saw the Devil" is a brutal and intense thriller about a secret agent seeking revenge on a serial killer who murdered his fiancée. It was directed by Kim Jee-woon and written by Park Hoon-jung. You can watch it on Xumo Play, Peacock TV, Vudu, Plex—Free Movies & TV, Pluto TV—It's Free TV, Tubi—Free Movies & TV, Hulu, Philo, Shudder, Prime Video, or Apple TV on your Roku device.

Each Korean thriller movie from the 2000s has a unique and charming storyline that will keep you glued to the screen. Each film delivers suspense and excitement in its own way. Its brutal and intense storyline keeps viewers on the edge of their seats. Whether you're a fan of thrillers or just looking for a movie that will keep you guessing, these Korean thriller movies from the 2000s are worth checking out. So grab some popcorn, sit back, and prepare to be thrilled by these cinematic masterpieces. Happy watching!

item.title: how to wire a 3 way switch
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
How to Wire a 3 Way Switch: A Guide for Beginner

Many people want to control their lights from two different places in their home. Knowing how to wire a 3 way switch can solve this problem and make your home more convenient. This electrical project helps you turn lights on and off from multiple locations.

A 3 way switch is a special type of light switch that works with another 3 way switch. These switches let you control one light or group of lights from two different spots. They are very useful for stairs, long hallways, and rooms with two doors.

In thiis article, we will talk about how to wire a 3 way switch by yourself. We will also talk about how do a 3 way switch work and when to use it. We gathered the guide from various sources, Sunday (25/5/2025).

How to Wire a 3 Way Switch

Before you start learning how to wire a 3 way switch, you must turn off the power at the circuit breaker. Safety is the most important part of any electrical work. Use a voltage tester to make sure no electricity flows through the wires before you begin.

Tools:

- 4-in-1 screwdriver

- Non-contact voltage tester

- Utility knife

- Wire strippers

Materials:

- 14-2 nonmetallic-sheathed cable (Type NM-B)

- 14-3 nonmetallic-sheathed cable (Type NM-B)

- 6-inch copper pigtails

- Electrical tape

- Light fixture

- Three-way switches (2)

- Wire nuts

Steps:

1. Run the Cables

First, run a 14-2 cable from your power source to the first switch location. Next, run a 14-3 cable from your first switch to the second switch. Finally, run another 14-2 cable from the second switch to the light fixture.

2. Wire the First Switch

Start by connecting the ground wires. Splice the two bare grounds from the cables to a 6-inch copper pigtail. Make a hook in the end of the pigtail and wrap clockwise around the green screw. Tighten. Next, splice the two neutrals (white wires) together. Do not attach them to the switch. The black wire from the power supply cable goes to the black common screw on the 3-way switch. The traveler wires (black and red) from the 14-3 cable go to the brass screws. It does not matter which one goes where. Wrap electrical tape around the switch to cover the exposed terminals.

3. Wire the Second Switch

Splice the two bare grounds to a 6-inch copper pigtail and attach to the green screw. Splice the two neutrals together. Do not attach to the switch. The black wire from the 14-2 cable going to the light goes to the black common screw. The black and red traveler wires from the 14-3 cable go to either of the brass traveler screws. It does not matter which traveler wire goes to which brass screw. Wrap the switch with tape.

4. Connect the Light Fixture

Make connections to the light fixture, starting with the bare copper ground wire. Connect the bare copper wire to the green ground screw on the light fixture. Splice the white neutral from the cable to the white neutral on the light fixture. Splice the black wire from the cable to the black wire on the light fixture. Attach the light fixture to the box.

5. Test Your Work

Check that switches are secure to the boxes and add faceplates. Turn on the breaker. Test your lights by flipping on and off at each location. If something is not working, turn off the breaker before checking it out. Double-check that you have travelers on the brass screws and power on the black common. Turn on the breaker, and turn on your lights.

How Does a 3 Way Switch Work?

Understanding how a 3 way switch works helps you wire it correctly. These switches are different from regular switches because they have three screw terminals instead of two. The three terminals are one common and two traveler terminals, plus a grounding screw.

The Common Terminal

The common terminal is usually a black or dark-colored screw that is different from the traveler terminals. This terminal connects to either the power source or the light fixture. Power comes into the first switch from the power source. Two wires called "travelers" connect the first switch to the second one. Then power leaves the second switch to go to the light.

The Traveler Terminals

The two traveler terminals are usually brass-colored screws. These terminals connect the two switches together using the traveler wires. No matter which switch you flip, the light responds.

How the Circuit Works

A 3-way switch allows you to control a light or group of lights from two locations. Unlike single-pole switches, which control lights from one location, 3-ways work in pairs. You must have two of them and only two. The system functions by establishing or breaking the electrical circuit. When both switches align in the same position, the circuit completes, turning the light on. When the switches are in different positions, the circuit breaks and the light turns off.

Internal Switch Mechanism

A 3-way switch does not have the words "on" or "off" written on it. Inside each 3-way switch, there are three primary terminals: one common and two travelers. The switch has an internal mechanism that routes electrical current between the traveler wires, allowing control of the light from multiple points.

When to Use a 3 Way Switch

3 way switches are very useful in many areas of your home. Knowing when to use them makes your house more convenient and safe. These switches work best in places where you need to control lights from two different locations.

Stairways

The most common place for 3 way switches is on stairways. Install one switch at the bottom of the stairs and another at the top. This allows people to turn on the lights before going up or down the stairs. They can then turn off the lights when they reach the other end. This setup makes stairs much safer, especially at night.

Long Hallways

Long hallways are perfect for 3 way switch installation. Place one switch at each end of the hallway. People can turn on the lights when they enter the hallway and turn them off when they exit at the other end. This prevents people from walking through dark hallways.

Large Rooms with Multiple Entrances

Rooms with two or more doorways benefit from 3 way switches. Install switches near each entrance to the room. This lets people control the lights no matter which door they use to enter or leave. Large living rooms, kitchens, and bedrooms often have multiple entrances that make 3 way switches helpful.

Garages and Basements

Garages and basements are other great locations for 3 way switches. In garages, place one switch near the door from the house and another near the main garage door. In basements, install switches at the top and bottom of the basement stairs. These locations help ensure you always have light when you need it.

Outdoor Areas

3 way switches work well for outdoor lighting too. Install switches inside the house and outside on a patio or deck. This allows you to control outdoor lights from inside your home or when you are outside. Outdoor 3 way switches are especially useful for porch lights and patio lighting.

Bedrooms with Multiple Doors

Some bedrooms have doors to hallways and bathrooms. 3 way switches let you control the bedroom lights from either entrance. This is convenient when moving between rooms and helps avoid fumbling for light switches in the dark.

item.title: oppenheimer
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
5 Interesting Facts About "Oppenheimer" Movie

5 Interesting Facts About "Oppenheimer" Movie

Oppenheimer is one of the most awaited movie in 2023 because of many reasons. Apart from the fact that the director is Christopher Nolan, Oppenheimer also has some interesting facts that make this film highly anticipated by many people.

Oppenheimer is the first film Christopher Nolan has worked on after leaving Warner Bros. Before leaving Warner Bros, Christopher Nolan was known to have worked with Warner Bros and HBO for a long time. Oppenheimer's film will be Christopher Nolan's 12th film and is being worked on with Universal Pictures.

Nolan's first film after leaving Warner Bros.

Christopher Nolan's Oppenheimer film is an adaptation of a book titled "American Prometheus: The Triumph and Tragedy of J. Robert Oppenheimer" by Martin Sherwin and Kai Bird which won the Pulitzer Prize in 2006.

Adapted from a book

Oppenheimer's film stars 5 Oscar-winning actors and actresses, including Matt Damon, Rami Malek, Gary Oldman, Casey Affleck, and Kenneth Branagh.

Starred by 5 Oscars Winner Actors

Usually, a film is produced by the director, actors, or production house of a film. However, for Christopher Nolan's Oppenheimer, his wife Emma Thomas served as the producer of the film.

Produced by Nolan's wife, Emma Thomas

Oppenheimer's film reportedly cost US$100 million dollars. However, it is reasonable considering the number of quality actors and actresses involved in this film.

It has a production cost of 100 million USD

item.title: Sylvester Stallone
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
Sylvester Stallone Hires Navy SEALs to Train His Daughters' Self-Defense Before Moving to New York

Sylvester Stallone Hires Navy SEALs to Train His Daughters' Self-Defense Before Moving to New York

Sylvester Stallone seems uneasy about letting his two daughters, Sophia and Sistine, live in New York, away from him. As a result, so that his children can take care of themselves, the actor, who is synonymous with the role of Rambo, hired Navy SEAL soldiers to train them in self-defense.

Sophia and Sistine even had to practice military style in the forest.

"That was the hardest. We were in the forest for about six hours," Sistine, 25, quoted the New York Post as saying.

"I'm not surprised my dad put us through this because all our lives, we grew up together, he did military-like martial arts training," she added.

Sophia said he and her two sisters have routinely practiced strength and self-defense with her father since childhood. It was done every morning.

"It was a strict routine. Every day at 6am, he made us eat eggs with tomato sauce. For some reason, that combination of food felt very big (portion)," said Sophia, now 27 years old.

"We then did a lot of sit ups, push ups, pull ups, clean, and jerk," she continues.

Sylvester Stallone's children grew up in Los Angeles but now have to settle in New York. They have lived in the city nicknamed the Big Apple for a year.

According to Sophia and Sistine, their father still considers their home on New York's East Coast unsafe.

"I don't think his anxiety will decrease," says Sistine.

"He's like an old-fashioned overprotective father figure. Three daughters at an age where, you know, we're everywhere and traveling a lot," she adds.

Sylvester Stallone's wife, Jennifer Flavin, can visit their children anytime. That gives the 77-year-old actor some peace of mind.

"My mom can track us on (the app) Find My Friends so they know where we are," Sophia said.

item.title: Taylor Swift Movie
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
Taylor Swift Movie: A Cinematic Journey Through 5 Of Her Movie Appearances

Taylor Swift Movie: A Cinematic Journey Through 5 Of Her Movie Appearances

Dive into the world of Taylor Swift like never before! Did you know that besides making incredible music, Taylor also acted in some movies?

Let's take a playful journey through five Taylor Swift movies that brought her magic to the screen. Each film gives us a glimpse into the many talents of this beloved artist. So, grab some popcorn, get cozy, and let's explore tales that go beyond the songs we love.

Here are some Taylor Swift movie appearances that are worth watching, compiled from numerous sources, on Wednesday (22/11/2023).

1. Amsterdam (2022) - A Twisty Period Mystery


In the puzzling world of "Amsterdam" (2022), Taylor Swift takes on the role of Elizabeth "Liz" Meekins. She is thrust into a period mystery woven by director David O. Russell.

Taylor Swift Movie

As the story develops, Meekins' fate turns dark with a shocking autopsy. It tells of a fatal dose of poison. The intrigue deepens as Burt and Harold (portrayed by other cast members) are entangled in a web of framed charges. It leads the story to a fixed escape from the clutches of the law.

2. Valentine's Day (2010) - A Tale of Romance and the Melodies of Love

In the heartwarming romantic comedy "Valentine's Day" (2010), Taylor Swift played the character Felicia Miller. Beyond her on-screen charm, Swift gifts the audience with the beautiful song "Today Was a Fairytale."

It is in perfect harmony with the blossoming romance described in the film. Interestingly, the movie also marks a real-life chapter as it overlaps Swift's brief romance with Taylor Lautner. This movie became a muse for her following musical creations.

3. The Giver (2014) - Swift's Dystopian Debut


Venturing into the realm of dystopia, Taylor Swift graces the screen in "The Giver" (2014). Based on Lois Lowry's young adult novel, Swift makes a cameo appearance as Rosemary.

Taylor Swift Movie

Rose is the original chosen one in a society grappling with its dark past. Swift's commitment to the role is highlighted by her decision to don a brown wig. She shredded her pop star image to engage herself in the poignant story.

4. All Too Well: The Short Film (2021) - A Visual Symphony of Heartbreak

Taylor Swift makes her director debut in the poignant "All Too Well: The Short Film" (2021). She crafted a visual masterpiece to accompany her critically acclaimed song. This film is starring Sadie Sink and Dylan O'Brien alongside Swif.

The short film dives deep into the emotional nuances of a relationship. Set against the haunting backdrop of the uncut, 10-minute version of "All Too Well," the film delicately weaves a tale of love, loss, and bittersweet memories that stay.

5. Miss Americana (2020) - The Candid Journey of Taylor Swift


"Miss Americana" (2020) invites audiences into the candid and personal realm of Taylor Swift's life. This documentary describes several critical years of her career.

Taylor Swift Movie

It peels back the layers to show the woman behind the music. It ranges from navigating the complexities of fame to finding her voice in the world. "Miss Americana" provides an intimate lens into the challenges and successes shaping Swift's record.

We finish traveling through the cinematic landscape of Taylor Swift's movie appearances. Each film becomes a chapter in her multifaceted journey.

These Taylor Swift movies showcase the singer's versatility as a performer and storyteller. From fairytale romances to dystopian landscapes, Swift's cinematic act adds another layer to her legacy.

Taylor Swift Movie

item.title: Clean
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
8 Ways to Clean Your Car Dashboard and Keep It Fresh

You can enjoy a clean and fresh dashboard whenever you get behind the wheel with a little effort and consistency.(Photo by StockCake-Elegant Driving Gloves)

8 Ways to Clean Your Car Dashboard and Keep It Fresh

Your car's dashboard is one of the first things you see when entering your vehicle.

A clean and fresh dashboard looks great and contributes to a more pleasant driving experience. This article will explore eight effective ways to clean your car dashboard and keep it looking its best. Whether you're a new car owner or have been driving for years, these tips will help you maintain a spotless dashboard.

1. Gather the Right Materials

Before you start cleaning your dashboard, having the right tools and materials is essential. Here's what you'll need to clean a car dashboard effectively:

Microfiber cloths


  • Vacuum cleaner with brush attachment
  • All-purpose cleaner or specialized dashboard cleaner
  • Soft-bristled brush
  • Cotton swabs
  • Water

Having these items on hand will make cleaning much easier and more efficient.

Ways to Clean Your Car Dashboard

2. Remove Loose Dirt and Dust

The first step in how to clean a car dashboard is to remove any loose dirt and dust. This prevents scratching the surface when you start wiping it down. Here's how to do it:

Use the brush attachment of your vacuum cleaner to remove loose particles from the dashboard surface gently.


  • Pay special attention to crevices, vents, and hard-to-reach areas where dust accumulates.

  • If you don't have a vacuum cleaner, use a soft-bristled brush to sweep the dust into a dustpan or onto the floor for later cleaning.

Ways to Clean Your Car Dashboard

3. Wipe Down the Dashboard

After removing loose dirt, it's time to wipe your dashboard thoroughly. Follow these steps:

  • Dampen a microfiber cloth with water. Ensure it's not too wet, as excess water can damage electronic components.

  • Gently wipe the entire dashboard surface, working in small sections.


  • For stubborn dirt, use a small amount of all-purpose or specialized dashboard cleaner. Always check the product's instructions to ensure it's safe for your dashboard material.

  • Pay extra attention to frequently touched areas like the steering wheel and control buttons.

4. Clean Hard-to-Reach Areas

Dashboards often have small crevices and tight spaces that are difficult to clean with a regular cloth. Here's how to tackle these areas:

  • Use cotton swabs slightly dampened with cleaner to reach into small spaces and around buttons.


  • For air vents, use a soft-bristled or foam brush to remove dust and debris.

  • Be gentle to avoid damaging any delicate components or pushing dirt further into crevices.

Ways to Clean Your Car Dashboard

5. Address Stains and Sticky Spots

Sometimes, your dashboard may have stains or sticky spots from spills or other accidents. Here's how to clean a car dashboard with these issues:

  • For sticky residue, use warm water and mild soap.

  • Apply the solution to a microfiber cloth and gently rub the affected area.

  • For tougher stains, you may need a specialized cleaner designed for your dashboard's material (plastic, vinyl, or leather).

  • Always test any cleaning solution on a small, inconspicuous area first to ensure it doesn't cause discoloration or damage.

6. Protect and Condition the Dashboard

After cleaning, it's important to protect your dashboard to keep it looking fresh and prevent future damage:

  • Use a dashboard protectant or conditioner specifically designed for your dashboard's material.

  • Apply a small amount to a clean microfiber cloth and spread it evenly across the dashboard.

  • Pay special attention to areas that receive direct sunlight, as these are more prone to fading and cracking.

  • Allow the protectant to dry completely before driving your car.

7. Maintain a Regular Cleaning Schedule

To keep your dashboard looking its best, establish a regular cleaning routine:

  • Perform a quick dust and wipe-down weekly using a microfiber cloth.

  • Do a more thorough cleaning, including vacuuming and conditioning, at least once a month.

  • Address spills and stains immediately to prevent them from setting in and becoming more challenging to remove.

8. Prevent Future Buildup

Taking steps to prevent dirt and dust buildup can make future cleaning easier:

  • Use a windshield sunshade when parking to reduce dust accumulation and protect your dashboard from UV damage.

  • Keep your car's interior clean overall to minimize the amount of dirt that settles on the dashboard.

  • Avoid eating in your car to prevent crumbs and spills on the dashboard.

  • Consider using air purifiers or deodorizers to keep the air inside your car fresh, which can help reduce the amount of airborne particles settling on your dashboard.

Regular cleaning not only improves your car's appearance but also helps preserve the dashboard's material, potentially increasing your vehicle's resale value. Always use appropriate cleaning products for your specific dashboard material and be gentle during the cleaning process to avoid any damage. You can enjoy a clean and fresh dashboard whenever you get behind the wheel with a little effort and consistency.

By following these eight tips on how to clean a car dashboard, you can keep your vehicle's interior looking fresh and well-maintained.

item.title: Music Quotes
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
95 Inspiring Music Quotes to Uplift Your Soul

Music can touch our hearts, inspire our minds, and move our souls. From classical composers to modern pop stars, countless individuals have shared their thoughts on the magic of melody.

This collection of 95 music quotes celebrates the universal language that connects us all.

Quotes About Music and Life

1. Music is the soundtrack of our lives.

2. Life without music would be a mistake.

3. Music expresses what words cannot say.

4. Where words fail, music speaks.

5. Music is what feelings sound like.

Inspirational Music Quotes

6. Music can change the world.

7. Let the music heal your soul.

8. Music gives wings to the mind.

9. Music washes away the dust of everyday life.

10. Music is the universal language of humanity.

Quotes About the Power of Music

11. Music has the power to unite us all.

12. Music can lift us out of darkness.

13. There’s magic in every song.

14. Music is a higher revelation than philosophy.

15. Music is the shorthand of emotion.

Famous Musician Quotes

16. “Music is life itself.” – Louis Armstrong

17. “One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.” – Bob Marley

18. “Music is the strongest form of magic.” – Marilyn Manson

19. “Music is the wine that fills the cup of silence.” – Robert Fripp

20. “Music is the emotional life of most people.” – Leonard Cohen

Quotes About Music and Emotions

21. Music is the language of the heart.

22. A song can say more than a thousand words.

23. Music speaks what cannot be expressed.

24. Melodies unlock the doors to our feelings.

25. Music is the poetry of the air.

Short Music Quotes

26. Music heals.

27. Life is a song – sing it.

28. Music is my therapy.

29. Rhythm is life.

30. Music = happiness.

Quotes About Singing

31. Sing like no one is listening.

32. A bird doesn’t sing because it has an answer, it sings because it has a song.

33. When words fail, sing.

34. Singing is like breathing for the soul.

35. Those who wish to sing always find a song.

Quotes About Playing Instruments

36. Music is the art of thinking with sounds.

37. The piano keys are black and white but they sound like a million colors in your mind.

38. A painter paints pictures on canvas. But musicians paint their pictures on silence.

39. Life is like a piano. What you get out of it depends on how you play it.

40. The violin is my mistress, but the guitar is my master.

Quotes About Music and Creativity

41. Music is the art of arranging sounds in time.

42. Without music, life would be a blank canvas.

43. Music is painting in the air.

44. The music is not in the notes, but in the silence between.

45. Music is the space between the notes.

Philosophical Music Quotes

46. Music is the harmony of the universe.

47. Music is the divine way to tell beautiful, poetic things to the heart.

48. Music is the arithmetic of sounds as optics is the geometry of light.

49. Music is the mediator between the spiritual and the sensual life.

50. Music is the movement of sound to reach the soul for the education of its virtue.

Quotes About Music and Memory

51. A song can take you back instantly to a moment or a place in time.

52. Music is the soundtrack to your life story.

53. Old songs are like old friends.

54. Music is what memories sound like.

55. Songs are like time capsules for feelings.

Quotes About Music and Healing

56. Music is medicine for the soul.

57. The right song can lift your spirits and mend a broken heart.

58. Music can heal wounds that medicine cannot touch.

59. Where words leave off, music begins to heal.

60. A melody can cure more than a medicine.

Quotes About Music and Nature

61. Nature is the music of silence.

62. The earth has music for those who listen.

63. Birds are nature’s original songwriters.

64. The wind whispers melodies to those who listen.

65. The rhythm of the ocean is nature’s lullaby.

Quotes About Music Education

66. Music education opens doors that help children pass from school into the world around them.

67. Music training is a more potent instrument than any other for education.

68. The future of our nation depends on providing our children with a complete education that includes music.

69. Music education can help spark a child’s imagination or ignite a lifetime of passion.

70. An education in the arts is essential to students’ intellectual, social, physical, and emotional growth.

Quotes About Music and Culture

71. Music is the universal language of mankind.

72. Every culture has its own music.

73. Music bridges cultural divides.

74. The music of a country reflects its people.

75. Songs carry the stories of generations.

Quotes About Music and Technology

76. Technology has forever changed how we create and consume music.

77. Digital tools have democratized music-making.

78. The internet has made music more accessible than ever before.

79. Streaming has revolutionized how we listen to music.

80. AI is pushing the boundaries of musical composition.

Quotes About Music and Spirituality

81. Music is the language of the spirit.

82. Sacred music lifts the soul to higher realms.

83. Spiritual songs connect us to the divine.

84. Music can be a form of prayer.

85. Hymns are the poetry of heaven.

Quotes About Music and Science

86. Music activates more areas of the brain than any other human activity.

87. The physics of music reveals the mathematics of the universe.

88. Neuroscience is uncovering the profound effects of music on the brain.

89. Music therapy is a growing field backed by scientific research.

90. The science of acoustics explains how music moves through space.

Quotes About Music and Love

91. Music is love in search of a word.

92. Love songs express what the heart cannot say.

93. Music is the food of love.

94. A romantic playlist can set the mood for love.

95. Couples often have “their song” that represents their relationship.

Conclusion

These 95 music quotes remind us of the incredible power and beauty of melody, rhythm, and harmony. From expressing our deepest emotions to bringing people together across cultures, music truly is a universal language that speaks to the human soul.

Whether you’re a musician, music lover, or simply someone who appreciates the artform, we hope these quotes have inspired you to keep music in your heart and let it enrich your life every day.

item.title: James Spader Confirmed to Return as Ultron in New Marvel's 'Vision' Series
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
James Spader Confirmed to Return as Ultron in New Marvel's 'Vision' Series

James Spader Confirmed to Return as Ultron in New Marvel's 'Vision' Series

James Spader is set to return as Ultron in Marvel Studios' upcoming Vision series, reprising his role from 2015's "Avengers: Age of Ultron."

The series, starring Paul Bettany as Vision, is scheduled to debut in 2026 with Terry Matalas as showrunner.

Ultron, a villainous AI, has a deep history with Vision, as he originally created Vision's synthetic body.

A renowned American actor, Spader is celebrated for his roles in TV series like "The Blacklist" and "Boston Legal," and films such as "Sex, Lies, and Videotape" and "Lincoln."

Known for his distinctive voice and versatile performances, Spader has built a distinguished career across both drama and comedy.

Spader’s return hints that Ultron survived, setting up a dramatic reunion.

This Vision series also marks Marvel's first new live-action show in nearly two years.

item.title: legendary car brands
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
8 Legendary Car Brands That Do No Longer Exist

8 Legendary Car Brands That Do No Longer Exist

Many car brands made history but are no longer around.

These brands created unique and exciting cars that people loved. Some were known for fast sports cars, while others made family-friendly vehicles. Sadly, many of these brands faced financial problems or could not compete with other companies. Here, we will look at eight legendary car brands that are now gone and learn about their stories.

DeLorean

DeLorean Motor Company was started in 1975 by John DeLorean. The company is famous for the DeLorean DMC-12 sports car, which was in the movie "Back to the Future."

However, the company had money problems and went bankrupt in 1982. This was mainly because the founder was arrested for drug trafficking, hurting the company's reputation and sales.

Holden

Holden is a famous Australian car brand. It began in 1856 as a saddlery business and later made cars. Holden was very popular in Australia with models like the Holden Commodore and Holden Monaro.

However, in 2020, General Motors stopped the Holden brand because of low sales and tough competition in the car industry.

Plymouth

Plymouth was an American car brand that was started in 1928 by the Chrysler Corporation. Known for affordable and reliable cars, Plymouth was successful throughout the 20th century.

However, due to market changes and restructuring within Chrysler, Plymouth stopped making cars in 2001.

DeTomaso

DeTomaso was an Italian car company founded by Alejandro de Tomaso in 1959. The company made sports cars like the Mangusta and Pantera. Despite early success, financial problems, low sales, and difficulty meeting regulations led to their bankruptcy in 2004.

Pontiac

Pontiac was a brand under General Motors, and it started in 1926 to make performance cars. They created popular models like the GTO, Firebird, and Trans Am, which are loved by car enthusiasts.

However, General Motors stopped the Pontiac brand in 2010 due to low sales and the financial crisis of 2008.

Duesenberg

Duesenberg was an American luxury car maker which was started in 1913 by brothers Fred and August Duesenberg. They were known for high-performance cars. Despite their reputation, the Great Depression hurt their sales, and the company went bankrupt in 1937.

Saab

Saab was a Swedish car maker that started as an aircraft manufacturer in 1937 and later made cars. The brand was known for safe and innovative cars like the Saab 900 and Saab 9000.

However, Saab struggled with profits and changed ownership several times. In 2011, the company went bankrupt, ending the Saab brand.

Hummer

Hummer was a popular brand of trucks and SUVs in the late 1990s. Based on military vehicles, Hummer was known for its rugged design and off-road ability. However, it faced criticism for high fuel consumption during rising gas prices.

In 2010, General Motors stopped the Hummer brand due to financial losses. But in 2022, General Motors revived the brand with an electric truck called the "GMC Hummer EV."

item.title: Touching Love Messages to Make Him Cry
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
60 Touching Love Messages to Make Him Cry

60 Touching Love Messages to Make Him Cry

Are you looking for heartfelt ways to express your love to your partner? Sometimes, a simple "I love you" may not be enough to convey the depth of your emotions. That's where touching love messages come in. These messages have the power to touch the heart and bring tears of joy to your loved one's eyes.

When we think about love, words like "meaningful" and "heartfelt" come to mind. It is important to find the right words to express your love in a way that resonates deeply with your partner. Touching love messages have the ability to do just that. These messages go beyond simple words and connect with the emotions of your loved one.

Imagine receiving a message that truly captures the essence of your love. It can be a simple sentence or a heartfelt paragraph, but the impact it has is immeasurable. Touching love messages have the power to remind your partner of your love and create a deeper bond between the two of you.

In this article, we have selected some of the best touching love messages to make him cry from various sources, Tuesday (30/4/2024). From heartfelt declarations of love to profound expressions of gratitude, these messages will surely touch his heart.

A. Touching Love Messages to Make Him Cry That Show Your Affection

1. Every time I look into your eyes, I see a universe of love and warmth, and I'm grateful to be a part of it.

2. Your laughter is music to my soul, filling every corner of my heart with joy.

3. In a world where chaos reigns, you are my calm. Your presence alone soothes my spirit.

4. Your touch sends shivers down my spine, reminding me of the electricity that sparked our love from the beginning.

5. With every beat of my heart, it whispers your name, a constant reminder of the love that courses through my veins.

6. When you hold me close, I feel like I'm home, wrapped in the safety of your embrace.

7. Your kindness knows no bounds, and I am endlessly grateful for the way you love me unconditionally.

8. Just thinking about you brings a smile to my face, warming me from the inside out.

9. Your support has been my anchor through life's storms, guiding me through even the darkest of days.

10. I am forever in awe of the way you see the beauty in everything, especially in me.

11. Your patience is a testament to your love, always willing to wait for me, no matter how long it takes.

12. You are my greatest adventure, and I am endlessly grateful for every moment we share together.

13. Your flaws are what make you perfect to me, each one a testament to your humanity and the depth of your character.

14. In your arms, I find solace, knowing that no matter what happens, I am loved beyond measure.

15. Your love is the melody that dances through my heart, a song that I never want to end.

B. Touching Love Messages to Make Him Cry to Show Your Gratitude

1. Your love has been a beacon of light in my darkest moments, guiding me through the storms of life.

2. Every day with you is a gift, and I am endlessly grateful for the love and joy you bring into my life.

3. You have shown me what it means to be truly cherished, and for that, I will be forever thankful.

4. Your unwavering support has lifted me up when I felt like I couldn't go on, and I am eternally grateful for your strength.

5. Thank you for seeing the beauty in me, even when I couldn't see it in myself. Your belief in me has been my greatest blessing.

6. With you by my side, I am capable of anything. Your belief in me gives me the courage to chase my dreams.

7. Thank you for loving me despite my flaws and imperfections. Your acceptance has healed parts of me I never thought could be healed.

8. Your patience knows no bounds, and I am grateful for the way you always give me space to grow and learn.

9. Thank you for being my rock, for holding me steady when the world around me feels like it's falling apart.

10. Your kindness has touched my heart in ways I never thought possible, and I am thankful for every act of love you have shown me.

11. You have taught me the true meaning of compassion and empathy, and for that, I am forever grateful.

12. Thank you for the little things, like the way you make me coffee in the morning or hold my hand when I'm scared. These gestures mean more to me than words can express.

13. Your laughter is contagious, and I am grateful for the way you bring joy into every room you enter.

14. Thank you for loving me fiercely, for showing me what it means to be loved without reservation or condition.

15. Your presence in my life has brought me immeasurable happiness, and I am grateful for every moment we share together.

C. Touching Love Messages to Make Him Cry To Offer Your Forever Love

1. From the moment I met you, I knew that my heart had found its forever home in yours.

2. With every breath I take, I promise to love you more deeply than the day before, for eternity.

3. My love for you knows no bounds, reaching beyond time and space to declare my eternal devotion.

4. I want to spend every moment of forever with you, building a life filled with love, laughter, and endless adventures.

5. You are my soulmate, my other half, and I am committed to loving you fiercely for all eternity.

6. With you, I have found a love that transcends the limitations of this world, a love that will endure for all time.

7. I give you my heart, my soul, and my forever, knowing that together, we can conquer anything life throws our way.

8. My love for you is timeless, stretching across the ages to declare my unwavering commitment to you.

9. I choose you today, tomorrow, and for all the days to come, for you are my forever and always.

10. With you, I have found a love that is pure, true, and everlasting, and I am grateful for the gift of your presence in my life.

11. In your arms, I have found my sanctuary, my safe haven, and I vow to cherish and protect our love for all eternity.

12. I promise to stand by your side through every trial and triumph, for you are my forever love, my partner in this journey called life.

13. With you, I have found a love that is constant and unwavering, a love that will stand the test of time.

14. My love for you grows stronger with each passing day, a testament to the depth of my devotion and the sincerity of my heart.

15. I give you my forever, knowing that together, we are unstoppable, our love an unbreakable bond that nothing can sever.

D. Touching Love Messages to Make Him Cry For Long-Distance Couple

1. Even though miles apart, my love for you knows no bounds. You're always in my thoughts and heart.

2. Distance may separate us physically, but our love bridges the gap, growing stronger with every passing day.

3. Every moment spent away from you is a reminder of how much I cherish the moments we share together.

4. No matter the distance, my love for you only grows deeper. You're the anchor that keeps me grounded in this journey.

5. The miles between us fade away when I think of your smile, your laughter, and the love we share.

6. I may not be able to hold you right now, but I hold onto the hope of our future together, knowing that our love will see us through.

7. Though we may be far apart, our hearts beat as one, connected by the invisible thread of love that binds us together.

8. Every day without you is a struggle, but knowing that we're working towards our future together gives me strength.

9. Distance cannot diminish the love I feel for you. It only serves to remind me of how much you mean to me.

10. I may not be able to hold you in my arms right now, but know that you're always held close in my heart.

11. Though we may be oceans apart, our love is a bridge that spans the distance, bringing us closer with each passing day.

12. The thought of being reunited with you keeps me going, fueling my determination to overcome any challenges that come our way.

13. Every day brings us one step closer to being together again, and I can't wait for that moment when we can finally hold each other in our arms.

14. Though we may be separated by distance, our love knows no bounds, reaching across oceans and continents to bring us closer together.

15. Distance is just a test of our love, and I know that we'll emerge stronger and more resilient than ever before.

item.title: How To Keep A Relationship
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
How To Keep A Relationship Strong and Happy: 12 Tips for Having a Lasting

How To Keep A Relationship Strong and Happy: 12 Tips for Having a Lasting

Building a strong and lasting relationship with your partner needs effort and commitment from both parties. It's not always easy, but with the right tips and mindset, you can create a happy and trusting bond that will stand the test of time. Relationships can be challenging and rewarding. Building a lasting bond also takes both partners' understanding. If you want a happy and trusting relationship that stands the test of time, here are 12 tips to help you. Check out some tips to help you achieve just that:

1. Communication is Key

Open and honest communication is the foundation of any successful relationship.

Make sure to express your feelings, thoughts, and concerns to your partner.

Be a good listener and give them the space to share their side as well. Remember, practical communication is a two-way street.

How To Keep A Relationship

Trust is the glue that holds relationships together. Building trust takes time, but it is crucial for a lasting connection. Be faithful and keep your promises. Avoid lying or hiding things from your partner. Trust is earned through consistency and transparency.

2. Trust Each Other

pexels-trinity-kubassek

3. Give Each Other Space

While spending time together is important, it is equally essential to have some personal space. Allow each other to pursue individual hobbies, interests, and friendships. Having independence can strengthen your relationship by giving you both a chance to grow as individuals.

Never underestimate the power of appreciation. Express gratitude for the little things your partner does for you. It can be as simple as saying thank you or leaving a sweet note. Showing appreciation stimulates a positive atmosphere and support. So you can feel the love and care you have for each other.

4. Show Appreciation

5. Keep the Romance Alive

Sparks may fade over time, but that doesn't mean the romance should die. Keep the flame burning by surprising each other with thoughtful gestures, planning date nights, or expressing love and affection. Small acts of romance can go a long way in keeping the relationship exciting and passionate.

6. Be Understanding and Empathetic

No one is perfect, and we all have our flaws. It's essential to be understanding and empathetic towards your partner.

Be patient and try to see things from their perspective.

Avoid jumping to conclusions or being quick to judge. Instead, offer support and understanding during challenging times.

How To Keep A Relationship

Disagreements and conflicts are for sure in any relationship. The key is to handle them with respect and maturity. Avoid yelling or using hurtful words. Instead, calmly discuss the issue and find a solution together. Remember, it's not about winning the argument but finding a resolution that benefits both of you.

7. Resolve Conflicts Respectfully

priscilla-du-preez-unsplash

8. Laugh Together

Laughter is the best medicine, even in relationships. Find humor in everyday situations and share a good laugh with your partner. It lightens the mood and creates a sense of joy and happiness. Don't take yourselves too seriously, and enjoy the journey together.

9. Support Each Other's Goals

Motivate and support each other's dreams and aspirations. Be each other's biggest cheerleader. Celebrate each other's achievements and provide a shoulder to lean on during setbacks. Having a partner who believes in you can boost your confidence and strengthen your bond.

Intimacy goes beyond physical connection. It's about emotional closeness and vulnerability. Make time for intimate moments, both physically and emotionally. Show affection, hold hands, cuddle, and express your love regularly. Intimacy fosters a deep connection and keeps the relationship strong.

10. Keep Intimacy Alive

engin-akyurt-unsplash

11. Practice Forgiveness

Nobody is perfect, and mistakes will happen. Learn to forgive and let go of grudges. Holding onto past resentments will only create toxicity in the relationship. Instead, communicate your feelings, find a resolution, and move forward. Forgiveness is essential for healing and growth.

A relationship is a continuous journey of learning and growth. Embrace new experiences and challenges together. Explore new hobbies, travel, and learn from each other. Keep the relationship dynamic and exciting by never settling for complacency.

12. Never Stop Learning and Growing Together

In conclusion, building a happy, trusting, and lasting relationship needs effort and commitment from both partners.

Following these 12 tips can strengthen your bond and create a love that stands the test of time. Remember, relationships are a work in progress, and the small, everyday gestures make all the difference.

How To Keep A Relationship

item.title: India
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
Toilet Clogged, Air India Flight Returns to America After 10 Hours of Flying

A flight from Air India traveling from Chicago, USA, to Delhi had to return to O'Hare International Airport in Chicago after 10 hours in the air. This was due to multiple toilets on the plane being clogged.

The exact cause of the toilet blockage is unclear, and the airline has not explained yet. According to News18, only one toilet was functioning and was located in business class.

The airline stated that flight AI126 experienced a "technical issue" that required it to return to its base.

"AI126, operating from Chicago to Delhi on March 6, 2025, returned to Chicago due to a technical issue. After landing in Chicago, all passengers and crew disembarked normally and were provided accommodations to minimize inconvenience. Backup plans are being made to fly the passengers to their destination," the airline explained.

11 out of 12 Toilets were Clogged

However, someone familiar with the situation mentioned that the decision to return to Chicago was made when 11 out of 12 Boeing 777-300 ER toilets were clogged.

"There was only one working toilet in business class," they said.

According to Flightradar24, a flight tracking website, the plane turned around about 4 hours and 25 minutes into the flight, shortly after passing the coast of Greenland.

The flight took off from Chicago at 11:00 AM local time and landed back around 9:00 PM. The aircraft has a capacity of 342 passengers, including 303 economy seats. The airline stated that it would provide full refunds for the cancellation and offer complimentary rescheduling for the passengers.

item.title: Ocean Quotes
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
25 Ocean Quotes That Will Transport You Below the Sea

25 Ocean Quotes That Will Transport You Below the Sea

Can you imagine how beautiful the ocean is? Everything represents its beauty, from marine life in sparkling water to seashells washing up on the coast. If you want to know more about it, reading ocean quotes might be a great way.

Ocean quotes generally highlight the beauty and essence of the sea. These quotations also discuss inspiration, peacefulness, and the relationship between people and the sea. Reading ocean quotes can express feelings of admiration for the beauty of the sea. These words also reflect on the meaning and role of the sea in our lives.

Let’s dive into 25 beautiful ocean quotes below to take you underwater! pexels-belle-co-

Beautiful Ocean Quotes

  • "I love the ocean. I've always liked the blue, so tranquil and peaceful and gliding. And the fear of it." — Siouxsie Sioux

  • "Why do we love the sea? It is because it has some potent power to make us think things we like to think." — Robert Henri

  • "She loves the serene brutality of the ocean, loves the electric power she felt with each breath of wet, briny air." — Holly Black

  • "The heart of man is very much like the sea, it has its storms, it has its tides, and it is depths it has its pearls too." — Vincent Van Gogh

  • "The sea is an underwater museum still awaiting its visitors." — Philippe Diolé

  • "Dance with the waves, move with the sea, let the rhythm of the water set your soul free." — Christy Ann Martine

  • "They say home is where the heart is. For most people, that consists of four walls and a welcome mat. But for me, it's the ocean." — Unknown

  • "Because there's nothing more beautiful than the way the ocean refuses to stop kissing the shoreline, no matter how many times it's sent away." — Sarah Kay

  • "The sea does not like to be restrained." — Rick Riordan

  • "The ocean makes me feel really small and it makes me put my whole life into perspective." — Beyoncé

  • "In one drop of water are found all the secrets of all the oceans." — Kahlil Gibran


  • "Because there's nothing more beautiful than the way the ocean refuses to stop kissing the shoreline, no matter how many times it's sent away." — Sarah Kay

  • "That the sea is one of the most beautiful and magnificent sights in Nature, all admit." — John Joly

Ocean Quotes

Ocean Quotes from Movies

  • “A wise man once said, Look at the ocean and realize that no matter how famous you are or how much money you make know that you’ll never be as important as the ocean.” — Janet Jackson (as Justice) Poetic Justice (1993)

  • “Your ocean is an image of Eternity, I think. Such great spaces make us small.” — Cate Blanchett (as Queen Elizabeth I) Elizabeth, The Golden Age (2007)

“Picture a wave in the ocean. You can see it, measure it – its height, the way the sunlight refracts when it passes through – and it’s there, and you can see it, and you know what it is: it’s a wave. And then it crashes on the shore and it’s gone. But the water is still there. The wave was just a different way for the water to be for a little while.” — William Jackson Harper (as Chidi Anagonye) The Good Place (2020)

  • “The wave returns to the ocean. What the ocean does with the water after that is anyone’s guess.” — Kristen Bell (as Eleanor Shellstrop) The Good Place (2020)

  • “Away from all land, the ocean. It covers more than half the surface of our planet. And yet, for the most part, it is beyond our reach.” — David Attenborough Planet Earth (2006)

  • “When the waters of the ocean rise to the heavens, they lose their bitterness to become pure again” — Mohamed Majd (as The Father) The Great Journey (2004)

  • “They say home is where the heart is, and for most people that consists of four walls and a welcome mat. But for me, it’s the ocean, with the warmth of the sun on my skin.” — Bethany Hamilton (narrating) Soul Surfer (2011)

  • “I loved her. I loved her like an ocean loves water.” — Ryan Reynolds (as Wade Wilson/Deadpool) Deadpool 2 (2018)

  • “The ocean is not just our home, it is who we are.” — Willem Dafoe (as Nuidis Vulko) Aquaman (2018)

  • “Climate is controlled by the oceans. Oceans are the big guys; they’re in control.” — John Veron Racing Extinction (2015)

  • “Our strength comes from the Spirit of the Moon. Our life comes from the Spirit of the Ocean. They work together to keep balance.” — Johanna Braddy (as Princess Yu) Avatar: The Last Airbender (2005)

Ocean Quotes

“We know less about the deep oceans than we do the surface of the moon.” — Gary Merrill (as Dr. Boren) Around the World Under the Sea (1966)

item.title: AKB48
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
6 Photos of Wang Sing, Former AKB48 Who is Now a Pilot for Taiwan Airlines

She realized that an idol's career was only short-lived and she wanted a more sustainable job.

6 Photos of Wang Sing, Former AKB48 Who is Now a Pilot for Taiwan Airlines

A 29-year-old female pilot from EVA Air in Taiwan is attracting public attention.

She became a pilot whom a man usually dominated.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by 王馨 ⓌⒶⓃⒼ ⓈⒾⓃⒼ (@singsingwang)

This woman is Wang Sing.

She previously joined and graduated from AKB48 Team TP, the Taiwan branch of the famous Japanese girl group AKB48.

Famous for her role in AKB48, Wang has turned into a pilot. She usually shares her experiences on Instagram.

In an interview with Formosa TV News Network on YouTube, Wang explained why she left AKB48 TP to follow a career as a pilot.

Joining the girl group was her "true dream." But she realized that an idol's career was only short-lived. She wanted a more sustainable job and decided to become a pilot.

According to Mothership, Wang once failed a trainee pilot test in Taiwan. She got her pilot's license overseas.

"If you are willing to keep trying, you will eventually find your own way,"

she said at the end of the interview.

© trstdly 2023

item.title: wife
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
I Love My Wife Quotes: Warm Messages to Express Your Love

This article collects warm messages that are perfect for conveying your feelings for your wife. (Photo by ian dooley on Unsplash)

I Love My Wife Quotes: Warm Messages to Express Your Love

Expressing love to your wife is not just important but also deeply meaningful.

Sometimes, finding the right words to convey the depth of your affection can be a challenge. That's where “I love my wife quotes” come in.


This article collects warm messages that are perfect for conveying your feelings for your wife.

These quotes are perfect for someone looking for a way to express their feelings through a card, text message, or simply to remind them of their love.

Let’s read these “I love my wife quotes” and let them guide you to express your love and gratitude to the special woman in your life.

A. Romantic I Love My Wife Quotes

1. "You are the reason I wake up with a smile on my face and go to bed with a grateful heart. I love you endlessly."

2. "Your love is like a beautiful symphony that resonates in my soul. I am forever captivated by your grace and beauty."

3. "You are the queen of my heart, and I am honored to be your king. Together, we can conquer anything."

4. "You are the melody to my heart's song, the sunshine in my darkest days. I love you more than words can express."

5. "You are the epitome of grace, strength, and beauty. I am blessed to have you as my wife."

6. "You are the missing piece that completes my puzzle of life. I love you, my dear wife."

7. "Your love is the fuel that keeps me going, the light that guides me through the darkest nights. I love you more than words can describe."

8. "In your arms, I have found my safe haven. I am forever grateful for your love and warmth."

9. "With you, I have found my forever. You are my soulmate, my partner, and my best friend."

10. "Every day spent with you is a new adventure filled with love and laughter. I am so lucky to have you by my side."

B. Heartwarming I Love My Wife Quotes

1. “Your past may not have me there. But all the rest of your life I will always be with you.”

2. “I can't give you the sun and send flowers by phone. I had to write a message and send to your heart the warm sunshine of my soul.”

3. “If you're mad at me, shoot me with a bow and arrow, but don't aim at my heart. Cause you are always in there.”

4. “How can you make it not rain when the sky is thick with dark clouds? How can you keep the yellow leaves from falling when autumn has come? How can you make me not love you when you are here?”

5. “I love you for your simplicity, and wholeheartedly for your family, but I don't want you to be too busy and neglect to take care of yourself and wither away.”

6. “Everyone told me that an hour has 60, and a minute has 60 seconds, but no one taught me that a second without you is an endless second, a minute without you is an eternal minute.”

7. “Since the plane of my heart is lowered by the perpendicular from your gaze, I can't determine the radius to draw my circle of affection anymore.”

8. "No matter how many years pass, my love for you only grows stronger. You are my forever."

9. “Someday when I die or go somewhere far away, I will write your name on all the stars, so people can look up and understand how much you mean to me.”

10. “Please lend me 1 cent. I need to call your mother urgently to thank her for giving birth to someone like you.”

C. Sweet I Love My Wife Quotes

1. "In a world full of chaos, you are my peace. I am grateful for your love and the serenity you bring into my life."

2. "You are the reason I believe in miracles. Your love has the power to turn the ordinary into extraordinary."

3. "With you, every day feels like a fairytale. Thank you for making my dreams come true."

4. "Your love is the greatest gift I have ever received. I am forever thankful for your presence in my life."

5. "You are the missing piece that completes my puzzle of happiness. I am blessed to have you as my wife."

6. "With you by my side, I am invincible. Your love gives me the strength to overcome any challenge."

7. "Your love is the melody that fills my heart with joy. I am forever grateful for the beautiful symphony we create together."

8. "You are the light that brightens my darkest days. I am forever grateful for your love and presence in my life."

9. "You are my forever and always, the one who completes me in every way. I love you more than words can express."

10. "Your love is like a warm embrace that comforts me in times of need. Thank you for always being my rock."

item.title: earthquake
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
5 Simple Things You Should Do During an Earthquake

During an earthquake, it's critical to act quickly and effectively to ensure your safety and that of those around you.

5 Simple Things You Should Do During an Earthquake

Avoid rushing towards exits. Most injuries occur when people inside buildings attempt to move to a different location inside the building or try to leave.

Remain where you have sought shelter until the shaking ceases.

Stay Indoors Until the Shaking Stops

Windows can shatter with violent shakes, causing injuries from broken glass.

Also, exterior walls are generally less supported and more susceptible to collapse, so keep a distance from them.

Stay Away from Windows

If you find yourself outside when an earthquake hits, move to an open area away from buildings, streetlights, and utility wires.

Once in the open, stay there until the shaking stops. The greatest danger exists directly outside buildings, at exits, and alongside exterior walls.

If You Are Outside, Move to an Open Area

Pull over to a clear location, avoid overpasses, bridges, power lines, signs, and other hazards. Stay inside the vehicle with your seatbelt fastened until the earthquake stops.

Then proceed cautiously, avoiding roads, bridges, or ramps that might have been damaged by the quake.

If You Are in a Moving Vehicle, Stop as Quickly and Safely as Possible

Elevators might fail during an earthquake, trapping you inside.

Additionally, elevator shafts may be damaged, or power can be lost. Always use the stairs if you need to evacuate a building post-earthquake.

Don't Use Elevators

item.title: Things To Do In Omaha
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
5 Fun Things To Do In Omaha For Family And Children

Looking for a unique family trip destination in the US? You should consider Omaha, Nebraska. It's a city often overlooked by visitors. However, there are actually many fun things to do in Omaha that will make your family trip unforgettable. (Photo by John Matychuk on Unsplash)

5 Fun Things To Do In Omaha For Family And Children

While big cities like LA, New York, and Miami attract many tourists, there's something special about exploring a lesser-known place. Omaha, the largest city in Nebraska, might not be as famous, but it's a great choice for your next family adventure.

Located by the Missouri River, Omaha is not just a big city. It's a hidden treasure with lots of family-friendly things to do. Beyond its importance for business, it's a lively place waiting for curious travelers like you and your family. And if you're traveling with your family, you're in for a treat. Omaha offers plenty of enjoyable activities that will make your family trip unforgettable.

In this article, we selected some fun things to do in Omaha for families and children, according to various sources, Monday (21/8/2023). These are the places that will make your family's Omaha experience truly memorable. (Photo by John Matychuk on Unsplash)

The Henry Doorly Zoo and Aquarium is one of the best zoos in the world. This zoo is a great place for your family to learn about animals and wildlife. It is home to various animals from all around the world, ranging from the dry African desert to the depths of the ocean. (Photo by Zachary Spears on Unsplash)

1. Henry Doorly Zoo and Aquarium

The Desert Dome is one of the main features of the zoo. It's the biggest indoor desert in the world. The Desert Dome showcased various desert animals from all over the planet, from Africa and Australia to the Americas.

Another main feature of the zoo is the aquarium. This giant aquarium showcases beautiful and diverse marine life in the world, from cute penguins to majestic sharks.

The zoo also offers adventure trails for children. This facility allows your children to learn about many things by playing in nature.

2. Omaha Children's Museum

The Omaha Children's Museum is a fantastic spot in Omaha, Nebraska, perfect for families and kids. This place is all about hands-on learning and fun. (Photo by PLV Schools on Flickr/CC BY 2.0)

Omaha Children's Museum: Where Children Can Play and Learn

They've got different areas where kids can explore science, art, and more. From the Science & Technology Center to the Creative Arts Center, there's something for everyone. They even host events and programs that make learning an adventure. If you're looking for a place where learning and fun come together, this is it!

Lauritzen Gardens is a stunning botanical garden in Omaha, Nebraska, that appeals to nature enthusiasts. (Photo by Trent Ballard on Unsplash)

3. Lauritzen Gardens

A standout feature is the Marjorie K. Daugherty Conservatory. It houses a diverse array of tropical plants from across the globe, including colorful flowers and thriving ferns. (Photo by Jeffrey Hamilton on Unsplash)

For those looking to relax surrounded by nature's beauty, Lauritzen Gardens offers a peaceful escape. Its winding paths and fragrant flowers provide a soothing atmosphere, allowing visitors to find comfort and appreciate the wonders of nature. (Photo by Jeffrey Hamilton on Unsplash)

Bring your family and children to learn about the arts at the Joslyn Art Museum. Located in the heart of Omaha, it's known as the best art museum in Nebraska. (Photo by Andrew Faires on Unsplash)

4. Joslyn Art Museum

The museum is home to over 11,000 artworks from various eras, from antiquity to the present.

From beautiful Greek pottery to modern photography, you can find them all in this museum.

Don't worry if your child will get bored while visiting this museum. The museum also offers a variety of interesting and fun educational programs for children and youth. (Photo by Andrew Faires on Unsplash)

5. Old Market

One of the best things to do in Omaha for your family is to visit the Old Market. The Old Market is a very famous historic shopping neighborhood in downtown Nebraska. (Photo by Bobak Ha'Eri on Wikimedia/CC BY 3.0)

The Old Market is a perfect place to shop for souvenirs to bring home after your family adventure in Omaha. You can find many shops selling various items, from clothing and accessories to jewelry and antiques.

It's also a great place to treat your hunger in the middle of your journey in Omaha. From breakfast to dinner, you can find many restaurants, cafes, and even sweet shops in the Old Market.

Pandemic and virus-themed give viewers a thrilling escape into fictional worlds filled with infectious chaos. Here are five must-watch pandemic and virus-themed movies that will keep you on the edge of your seat:

Brad Pitt stars in this action-packed zombie thriller that follows a former United Nations employee as he races against time to stop a global zombie pandemic. Available to watch on Netflix.
