item.title: how to delete messages on Mac
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
How to Delete Messages on Mac or MacBook

Managing your messages is important for keeping your Mac organized and secure. Learning how to delete messages on Mac can help you clear clutter and free up space. Whether it’s removing personal chats or unnecessary files, the process is simple once you know the steps.

Knowing how to delete messages on Mac is also useful for privacy. Deleting messages ensures sensitive information doesn’t remain on your device. This is especially important if you share your Mac with others or if it’s used for work purposes.

In this article, we will guide you step by step on how to delete messages, attachments, and conversations on your Mac. These easy-to-follow instructions will make it simple for anyone to maintain a clean Messages app.

How to Delete Messages and Attachments on Mac

To delete specific messages or attachments:

1. Open the Messages app on your Mac.

2. Select a conversation from the sidebar.

3. Click on the specific message or attachment you want to delete.

4. Press the Delete key on your keyboard.

5. A pop-up will appear. Click “Delete” to confirm.

This action will move the deleted message or attachment to the “Recently Deleted” folder. Remember, this only removes the message from your device, not from the recipient’s.

You can also delete multiple messages by selecting several at once. Hold the Command key while clicking each message, then press Delete and confirm.

How to Delete a Conversation

If you want to delete an entire conversation, follow these steps:

1. Open the Messages app.

2. Locate the conversation you want to delete in the sidebar.

3. Right-click (or Control-click) on the conversation.

4. Choose “Delete” from the menu.

5. Confirm your choice by clicking “Delete” in the dialog box.

For a quicker method, you can swipe left on the conversation using a trackpad or Magic Mouse and click the delete button.

Deleting a conversation is a great way to declutter your Messages app, especially if you no longer need the conversation or if it’s taking up too much space with attachments.

How to Delete Several Files of the Same Type

Sometimes, you might want to delete multiple attachments like photos, videos, or documents at once. Here’s how to do it:

1. Open the Messages app and select a conversation.

2. Click the “Info” button in the top-right corner of the screen.

3. Scroll down to a specific category, such as “Photos” or “Documents.”

4. Click “Show More” to see all files in that category.

5. Select the files you want to delete by holding the Shift key and clicking on each file.

6. Right-click (or Control-click) and choose “Delete.”

7. Confirm by clicking “Delete” in the dialog box.

This method allows you to clear space by removing unnecessary attachments without deleting the entire conversation. It’s especially useful if you’re managing a conversation with a large number of media files.

How to Automatically Delete Old Messages on Mac

To keep your Messages app tidy, you can set it to automatically delete old messages. Here’s how:

1. Open the Messages app on your Mac.

2. Go to the menu bar and select “Messages,” then click “Settings.”

3. In the Settings window, click on the “General” tab.

4. Find the “Keep Messages” option and select a time frame from the drop-down menu:

- 30 Days

- 1 Year

- Forever

If you choose “30 Days” or “1 Year,” the Messages app will automatically delete conversations and attachments older than the selected time frame. This feature is ideal for saving storage space without manual effort.

Enabling this setting is particularly helpful for users who frequently receive large files or have limited storage space on their Mac.

How to Permanently Remove Deleted Messages and Attachments

Deleted messages and attachments are stored in the “Recently Deleted” folder for 30 days. To permanently remove them before the 30 days are up, follow these steps:

1. Open the Messages app.

2. From the menu bar, select “View” and click on “Recently Deleted.”

3. Browse the list of deleted items and select the ones you want to remove permanently.

4. Click “Delete” and confirm your choice by following the on-screen instructions.

Once deleted from the “Recently Deleted” folder, these items cannot be recovered. Be cautious when removing important files or conversations.

For those concerned about security, this step ensures sensitive information is completely erased from your device. It’s a good habit to regularly check the “Recently Deleted” folder and clear it out as needed.

By following these steps, you can efficiently manage your messages and attachments on Mac, keeping your device clutter-free and secure. Regular maintenance of the Messages app not only saves storage space but also ensures your personal information remains private.

item.title: justin bieber
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
Video of Justin Bieber Wanting to Protect Billie Eilish Goes Viral Again

Video of Justin Bieber Wanting to Protect Billie Eilish Goes Viral Again

Behind Justin Bieber's incredible popularity, there are many heartbreaking stories. The Canadian superstar has even been linked to P Diddy, who is now facing prison for sex trafficking.

P Diddy was a figure that Bieber admired when he first entered the music industry. The rapper and producer is also close friends with Usher and Scooter Braun, who managed Justin's career from the beginning.

Later, many videos of Hailey Baldwin's husband interacting with P Diddy circulated. One of the most attention-grabbing is the '48-hour' video, in which Bieber spends two days partying with Diddy.

In addition, Justin Bieber's touching video with Zane Lowe was widely discussed. In the video, he discusses the Changes 2020 album and his close relationship with Billie Eilish, a figure he really wants to protect in the music industry.

While wiping away tears, the 'Yummy' singer hopes Billie doesn't go through bad things like she did.

"I just want to protect her. I don't want her (Billie) to experience all the things I've experienced. I don't want that to happen to anyone," he said.

Billie Eilish herself is a young talent who still idolizes Justin Bieber. As an idol, Bieber appreciates his talented junior. They have a good relationship and hope to continue to support each other.

Meanwhile, fans see Bieber's crying as a deep trauma due to the ruthless treatment of music industry players. P Diddy is one of the figures strongly suspected of instilling fear in Justin Bieber.

item.title: monday motivation quotes
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
45 Monday Inspiration Quotes to Start the Week Feeling Motivated

Imagine waking up on Monday morning feeling energized and ready to conquer the week. While this might sound impossible, the right Monday inspiration quotes can transform your mindset and help you start your week with enthusiasm.

Many people struggle with Monday blues, feeling tired and unmotivated as they transition from weekend relaxation back to work mode. They often scroll through social media looking for Monday inspiration quotes to boost their mood, hoping to find the strength to get out of bed and face their responsibilities.

Finding the perfect Monday inspiration quotes can make a significant difference in how you approach the first day of the week. In this article, we'll share a collection of powerful quotes that will help you embrace Mondays and turn them into opportunities for success. We gathered these quotes from various sources, Sunday (8/12/2024). Let's start the week with encouragement!

Powerful Monday Inspiration Quotes

1. "Even the best weeks start with Monday." - Nice Peter

2. "Every Monday morning is new hope." - Maira Kalman

3. "Monday is for people with a mission." — Cristina Imre

4. "Mondays are the start of the work week which offer new beginnings 52 times a year!" - David Dweck

5. "When you start to do the things that you truly love, it wouldn't matter whether it's Monday or Friday; you would be so excited to wake up each morning to work on your passions." - Edmond Mbiaka

6. "Mondays are for fresh starts." - Unknown

7. "Hey, I know it's Monday. But it's also a new day and a new week. And in that lies a new opportunity for something special to happen." - Michael Ely

8. "This should be the spirit every Monday. Know that something good will always happen." - Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez

9. "Your Monday morning thoughts set the tone for your whole week. See yourself getting stronger, and living a fulfilling, happier and healthier life." - Germany Kent

10. "This is your Monday morning reminder that you can handle whatever this week throws at you." - Unknown

11. "When life gives you Monday, dip it in glitter and sparkle all day." - Ella Woodward

12. "Don't let the Monday morning quarterbacks stop you from being bold. You've got to set a high bar." - Antonio Villaraigosa

13. "It's Monday. Get a new perspective. Whatever obstacle you're facing—it's not permanent." - Unknown

14. "Mondays are tough only for those people, who don't know how to spend them cheerfully. Get up and have fun today!" - Unknown

15. "The worst Monday is the one that gets wasted for nothing." - Unknown

Inspirational Monday Morning Quotes

1. "Just one small positive thought in the morning can change your whole day." - Dalai Lama

2. "We get up in the morning. We do our best. Nothing else matters." - Judi Dench

3. "Each morning brings a hidden blessing; a blessing which is unique to that day, and which cannot be kept or re-used. If we do not use this miracle today, it will be lost." - Paulo Coelho

4. "With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts." - Eleanor Roosevelt

5. "Be willing to be a beginner every single morning." - Meister Eckhart

6. "Every morning you have two choices: continue to sleep with your dreams or wake up & chase them." - Kristin

7. "Success is to wake up each morning and consciously decide that today will be the best day of your life." - Ken Poirot

8. "You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction." - George Horace Lorimer

9. "Morning is an important time of day, because how you spend your morning can often tell you what kind of day you are going to have." - Daniel Handler

10. "If you get up in the morning and think the future is going to be better, it is a bright day. Otherwise, it's not." - Elon Musk

Motivational Quotes About Getting Started

1. "The secret of getting ahead is getting started" - Mark Twain

2. "It is not enough to stare up the steps, we must step up the stairs." - Vaclav Havel

3. "The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing." - Walt Disney

4. "You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step." - Martin Luther King, Jr.

5. "The first step towards getting somewhere is to decide that you are not going to stay where you are." - Chauncey Depew

6. "If you believe, then you have already taken the first step towards your achievement." - Rickson Gracie

7. "The act of taking the first step is what separates the winners from the losers." - Brian Tracy

8. "The greatest time wasted, is the time getting started." - Dawson Trotman

9. "Do not wait until the conditions are perfect to begin. Beginning makes the conditions perfect." - Alan Cohen

10. "The first step to becoming is to will it." - Mother Teresa

Inspirational New Day Quotes

1. "With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts." - Eleanor Roosevelt

2. "Every day is a new day, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on." - Carrie Underwood

3. "You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great" - Zig Ziglar

4. "Every day brings new choices." - Martha Beck

5. "You are what you choose to be today. Not what you've chosen to be before." - Wayne Dyer

6. "Each new day is a blank page in the diary of your life. The secret of success is in turning that diary into the best story you possibly can." - Douglas Pagels

7. "What I know for sure is that every sunrise is like a new page, a chance to right ourselves and receive each day in all its glory. Each day is a wonder." - Oprah Winfrey

8. "It's a new day, a new beginning for your new life. With discipline you will be amazed at how much progress you'll be able to make. What have you got to lose except the guilt and fear of the past?" - Jim Rohn

9. "Be willing to be a beginner every single morning." - Meister Eckhart

10. "Today will never happen again. Don't waste it with a false start or no start at all." - Og Mandino

item.title: bella hadid
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
7 Cool Things You Might Not Know About Bella Hadid

7 Cool Things You Might Not Know About Bella Hadid

Bella Hadid is a famous model you might have heard of. She's known for her stunning looks and modeling career. But did you know there are some interesting things about her that you might not be aware of? Let's explore 7 hidden facts about this amazing model!

Swipe up to read more!

Special Family Background

Bella comes from a diverse family. Her mom is Dutch, and her dad is from Palestine. She also a Muslim, and this unique mix makes her background special.

Speaking Up for Palestine

Bella cares about the Palestine issue. She talked about it on Instagram in 2017. Her family has roots in Palestine, and this topic is close to her heart.

Photography Dreams

Before becoming a model, Bella studied photography. But she left after a short time to follow her modeling dreams.

Different Hair for a Reason

Guess what? Bella dyed her hair to look different from her sister Gigi. They wanted to have their own unique styles.

The Most Beautiful Woman in The World (by ‘Golden Ratio’)

One scientific study declares Bella the most beautiful woman in the world! According to the 'Golden Ratio' equation, her face measurements matched the ancient Greeks' idea of beauty.

Horse-Riding Star

Bella had big dreams of being a horse rider when she was younger. She even won awards for riding. She dreamed of joining the Olympics. But her modeling career took her in a different direction.

Battling Lyme Disease

Bella is strong. She was diagnosed with Lyme disease as a child, and she's still getting treatment for it. She doesn't let it stop her from achieving her goals.

item.title: xbox
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
Xbox Release "Willy Wonka" Chocolate Controller

This unique chocolate controller is rumored can be eaten!

Xbox Release "Willy Wonka" Chocolate Controller

Xbox is known as a gaming device that often makes interesting features.

Most recently, the company from Microsoft is rumored to be making a Willy Wonka-style chocolate controller.

In fact, this chocolate controller is rumored can be eaten!

Xbox has partnered with Wonka to give away the first-ever edible chocolate Xbox controller and a special edition Xbox Series X — the console is not edible.

They're only available as part of a sweepstakes, so better hope you get that golden ticket! pic.twitter.com/cg7sX2H7ZF

— IGN (@IGN) November 13, 2023

This unique controller was created to welcome the upcoming movie "Wonka".

Ahead of Warner Bros Pictures' premiere of the movie "Wonka", Xbox welcomes the return of the famous chocolatier with a first-of-its-kind gaming experience.


The controller features a special burgundy-colored design inspired by Wonka's classic coat from the movie.

This chocolate-based controller comes with five additional chocolate truffles that have been created to enhance the Xbox gaming experience with a Wonka-inspired touch.

Fans can enter a draw to win an edible Xbox Controller made of 100% pure chocolate and wrapped in a distinctive gold wrapper, starting November 13.

The gaming company also created an Xbox Series X inspired by the movie.

This limited edition console is modeled after Willy Wonka's chocolate shop; however, unlike the controller, the game system is not edible.

Those interested in the sweepstakes can enter by following Xbox on the X app and retweeting the company's official sweepstakes tweet.

The sweepstakes runs from November 13 to December 14, just before the premiere of the movie starring Timothée Chalamet on December 15.

item.title: Cebu
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
The 5 Best Places To Live In Cebu, Philippines

The 5 Best Places To Live In Cebu, Philippines

Cebu is nestled in the heart of the Philippines. Cebu is a vibrant and varied province.

These areas in Cebu offer rich culture and breathtaking natural beauty. Are you seeking a bustling urban lifestyle or the calm of island living? Cebu has it all. This article explores the five best places to live in Cebu—each with its unique charm and reasons for popularity.

1. Cebu City - The Urban Hub

Cebu City is the provincial capital. It is the bustling epicenter of Cebu's economic, cultural, and educational activities. It boasts a dynamic urban lifestyle with a booming job market, educational institutions, and lively nightlife.

The city has historical landmarks such as Magellan's Cross and Fort San Pedro. These elements add a touch of heritage to its modernity. Cebu City offers many residential options, from luxurious condos to suburban homes. They make it a popular choice for those seeking a cosmopolitan lifestyle.

Photo: zany-jadraque-unsplash

2. Moalboal - Coastal Paradise

Moalboal is located on the southwestern coast of Cebu. It is a haven for nature lovers and beach fans. It is known for its crystal-clear waters and diverse marine life. Moalboal is a top destination for diving and snorkeling.

The relaxed atmosphere and stunning sunsets make it an ideal place for those looking to escape the city's hustle and bustle.

The friendly community and cheap cost of living are additional reasons. Moalboal is a popular choice for expatriates and retirees.

Best Places To Live In Cebu, Philippines

Bantayan Island is often called the "Little Boracay of Cebu." It is a peaceful tropical paradise. Bantayan Island has powdery white sand beaches and turquoise waters.

3. Bantayan Island - Tropical Paradise

Bantayan Island is a picture-perfect destination for those seeking calm and natural beauty. It's a place to unwind, disconnect from the world, and enjoy a slower pace of life.

The island's friendly locals and welcoming atmosphere. These qualities make it an excellent choice for a peaceful retreat.

Photo: big-dodzy-unsplash

Photo: brian-kairuz-unsplash

4. Lapu-Lapu City - Gateway to Adventure

Lapu-Lapu City is located on Mactan Island, Cebu, Philippines. It is a thriving city with a rich history and modern amenities. It's known for its nearness to Mactan-Cebu International Airport, making it a timely choice for routine travelers.

Lapu-Lapu City offers a range of residential options. It ranges from exclusive neighborhoods to more budget-friendly areas. Residents enjoy easy access to beautiful beaches, water sports, and lively markets. The city's cultural heritage, presented by the Lapu-Lapu Shrine, adds to its charm.

Photo: burak-ceviz-unsplash

5. Carcar City - Heritage and Tradition

Carcar City is located in the southern part of Cebu. It is a city steeped in history and tradition. Carcar City is known for its well-preserved Spanish-era architecture.

This city exudes a unique charm that transports you back in time. The town is famous for its treats, especially chicharrón (crispy pork skin) and ampao (rice cakes).

The cost of living in Carcar City is relatively low. That makes it an attractive option for those who enjoy a rich cultural heritage and a slow-paced lifestyle.

item.title: history of kissing
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
Here's the History of Kissing in the World. It's Been Around Since 4,500 Years Ago

Here's the History of Kissing in the World. It's Been Around Since 4,500 Years Ago

According to some theories, kissing is the ultimate love language in a relationship. For some people, kissing is sacred.

However, have you ever thought about the history of kissing?

No one knows for sure when humans first made mouth-to-mouth contact and used it for romance and erotic pleasure.

However, scientists reported in May 2023 that humans have been kissing for at least 4,500 years.

"Kissing has been practiced for much longer than we might realize," said the study's lead author, Dr. Troels Pank Arboll.

The researchers referenced these findings from thousands of clay slabs from Mesopotamia that have survived to the present day.

"This fascinating case study adds to the growing body of scientific research on romantic or sexual kissing, and helps us understand the origins of kissing in human social behavior and intimate life specifically," said evolutionary biologist Dr. Justin R. Garcia, a professor at Indiana University in Bloomington.

"The experience of romantic and sexual behavior is part of larger patterns of human social behavior," Garcia says.

"Understanding how these behaviors express themselves, change, and evolve helps us better understand who we are today," he continued.

The study authors also revealed that the origins of kissing are deeply rooted in human history and evolution, and its role and significance in ancient cultures likely remain undiscovered.

Previously, the oldest recorded evidence of kissing was attributed to the Vedas, a group of Indian scriptural texts that date back to around 1500 BC and are the foundation of Hinduism.

One of the scriptures, the Rig Veda, depicts people touching their lips to each other.

Erotic kissing is also shown in great detail in other ancient Indian texts, such as The Kama Sutra, a guide to sexual pleasure dating back to the third century AD. Therefore, modern scientists have concluded that romantic kissing most likely originated in India.

Humans are not the only species that kiss.

One type of primate, the chimpanzee, also kisses each other as a greeting. Another primate species, bonobos, also kiss as part of their sexual activities.

"They have intercourse face to face and often perform intensive tongue kissing," wrote primate expert Frans B.M. De Waal.

Researcher Arboll notes it's possible that kissing evolved in primates to tell how a partner is doing through their saliva and breath.

On the other hand, kissing is not always about pleasure and romance.


One of the most damaging side effects of kissing is the spread of infectious diseases.

According to another study, written in July 2022 by researchers from institutions in Europe, the UK, and Russia, the rapid increase of herpes simplex virus HSV-1 lineages in Europe around 5,000 years ago is linked to the emergence of a sexual kissing culture.

item.title: Mel Gibson Movies
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
7 Best Mel Gibson Movies You Should Not Missed Out

7 Best Mel Gibson Movies You Should Not Missed Out

Mel Gibson, a renowned actor with a career spanning decades, has graced the silver screen with his captivating performances.

From epic historical dramas to gritty action thrillers, Gibson's versatility knows no bounds. Here is the list of the best Mel Gibson movies you should not miss out on.

1. Braveheart (1995)

- IMDb: 8.3
- Rotten Tomatoes: 76%
- Available on: Paramount+, Vudu, Amazon Prime Video, and Apple TV.

Braveheart

In this historical epic, Mel Gibson portrays the Scottish warrior William Wallace, who led a rebellion against the oppressive English rule in the 13th century. Gibson's portrayal of Wallace is powerful and emotional, capturing the essence of a man fighting for freedom and justice. His performance earned him critical acclaim and an Academy Award for Best Director.

2. Gallipoli (1981)

- IMDb: 7.4
- Rotten Tomatoes: 91%
- Available on: Vudu, Amazon Prime Video, and Apple TV.

Gallipoli

Set during World War I, Gallipoli follows two young Australian soldiers who enlist to fight in the Battle of Gallipoli. Mel Gibson shines in his role as one of the soldiers, displaying a range of emotions from camaraderie to heartbreak as the horrors of war unfold. His performance is raw and heartfelt, showcasing his ability to bring complex characters to life on screen.

3. Mad Max (1979)

- IMDb: 6.8
- Rotten Tomatoes: 91%
- Available on: Vudu, Amazon Prime Video, and Apple TV.

Mad Max

Mad Max marks the beginning of Gibson's iconic role as the titular character Max Rockatansky, a post-apocalyptic police officer seeking vengeance for the murder of his family. Gibson's stoic yet intense portrayal of Max established him as an action star and set the tone for the franchise's success. His performance is riveting, capturing the essence of a man pushed to the edge in a dystopian world.

- IMDb: 7.2
- Rotten Tomatoes: 62%
- Available on: Vudu, Amazon Prime Video, and Apple TV.

4. The Patriot (2000)

The Patriot

In this American Revolutionary War drama, Mel Gibson stars as Benjamin Martin, a farmer turned reluctant hero who joins the fight for independence. Gibson's portrayal of Martin is layered and intense, showcasing his range as an actor. His performance balances moments of vulnerability with scenes of fierce determination, making him a captivating lead in the film.

5. Lethal Weapon (1987)

- IMDb: 7.6
- Rotten Tomatoes: 80%
- Available on: Vudu, Amazon Prime Video, and Apple TV.

Lethal Weapon

Mel Gibson takes on the role of Martin Riggs, a loose-cannon detective paired with a by-the-book partner, in this action-packed buddy cop film. Gibson's performance as Riggs is charismatic and dynamic, blending humor with intensity in a way that only he can. His chemistry with co-star Danny Glover is electric, making Lethal Weapon a standout in the action genre.

6. The Year of Living Dangerously (1982)

- IMDb: 7.1
- Rotten Tomatoes: 88%
- Available on: Vudu, Amazon Prime Video, and Apple TV.

The Year of Living Dangerously

Set in Indonesia during the overthrow of President Sukarno, this political drama follows a young Australian journalist and his romance with a British diplomat's wife. Mel Gibson delivers a nuanced performance as the journalist Guy Hamilton, navigating love and danger in a turbulent time. His portrayal is captivating, showcasing his ability to bring depth to a complex character.

7. The Road Warrior (1981)

- IMDb: 7.6
- Rotten Tomatoes: 93%
- Available on: Vudu, Amazon Prime Video, and Apple TV.

The Road Warrior

In this post-apocalyptic action film, Mel Gibson reprises his role as Max Rockatansky in a fight for survival against ruthless marauders. Gibson's performance as Max is fierce and intense, embodying the character's relentless quest for redemption and justice. His portrayal elevates the film to cult status, solidifying his place as an action icon.

item.title: london to singapore
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
The Story of a Couple Traveling by Car from London to Singapore for 100 Days

The Story of a Couple Traveling by Car from London to Singapore for 100 Days

A couple, Jeremy See and his wife, recently completed a 100-day road trip from London, England, to Singapore. They shared several fun experiences and challenges that have been experienced on this trip.

As reported by AsiaOne, they are known to have explored 23 countries and met various people from all walks of life during this trip.

"It feels unreal. This seemingly impossible journey across 23 countries is not only possible, but can be completed successfully without any major problems," the 47-year-old told AsiaOne.

They reportedly made it to Singapore on November 10 by car.

However, their success was not separated from the problems accompanying the trip. They faced immigration challenges, given the many countries they had to cross, difficult mountain roads, and even fuel problems in some areas.

"At many border crossings, we often felt like the journey was coming to an end. Immigration and customs officials kept asking for more documentation, checking our cars, and the language barrier didn't help," Jeremy explains.

Another issue is when many border offices close early. This exposed them to the risk of being stuck between borders in no man's land.

Fuel constraints were also part of Jeremy and his wife's experience. Some regions enforce fuel rationing, while in areas such as Iran and Central Asia, the quality of gasoline could be better.

Luckily, the couple had prepared themselves by bringing some octane boosters to improve the fuel quality of their vehicle. Despite experiencing problems in China due to refueling rules that require local ID to enter gas stations, they were grateful to get help and be able to continue their journey.

Meanwhile, another challenge was the difficult road conditions.

"We also had to drive on mountain roads, which were in very bad condition, very narrow and prone to landslides," Jeremy said.

"We could see many vehicles rolled over thousands of feet into the foothills of the mountains. The narrow road meant there was no turning back. But we drove slowly and made sure we didn't fall asleep while driving with good music, snacks and drinks," he adds.

The trip also took them to remote places rarely visited by tourists, even with no cellular signal and no locals. Despite feeling scared, they kept going with food and water supplies.

"In some places, we didn't see a single car or person for more than half an hour, and there was no cell signal," says Jeremy.

"We were scared, but we kept our eyes on the road and kept going. We brought food and water that would help us for a while if we got stuck for any reason," said the man with five children.

In addition to external problems, the couple experienced internal problems, namely physical exhaustion for long journey.


"...We got sick twice because we had to wake up early every day to make sure we got to our next destination before dark," Jeremy explained, saying that the weather and altitude difference exhausted him and his wife on some parts of the journey.

Despite traveling 25,000km, the couple did not feel homesick.

"With the video calls and sense of adventure that drove us, we didn't feel homesick," Jeremy said.

The couple spent $110,000 on the trip, with about $45,000 per person for food, hotels, and places or activities of interest, about $12,000 for shipping and vehicle licensing, and $8,000 for fuel.

Although they only returned a few weeks ago, they are reportedly planning their next trip to Japan with their two youngest children.

"We will take our two youngest children to Japan before school starts. That is by plane," Jeremy concluded.

item.title: when is national sons day 2025
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
When is National Sons Day 2025? Why There Are Two of Them and Sweet Wishes for Your Son

When is National Sons Day 2025? This is a question many parents and families ask as they prepare to celebrate their sons. National Sons Day is an opportunity to honor the role of sons in families and reflect on the importance of raising them with love, guidance, and support.

This special day is not as well-known as Mother’s Day or Father’s Day, but it holds great meaning for many people. Parents use this occasion to express their love and appreciation for their sons, strengthening family bonds. It is also a time to encourage important conversations between parents and their children.

So, when is the National Sons Day 2025? There is some confusion about when National Sons Day takes place. Unlike other family-related holidays, National Sons Day has two different dates.

In this article, we will talk more about National Sons Day, when is it celebrated, and why are there two National Sons Day. We will also share some sweet and heartwarming National Sons Day wishes for your son. We gathered the information from various sources, Wednesday (5/3/2025).

What is National Sons Day?

National Sons Day is a day dedicated to celebrating and appreciating sons. It recognizes the role of sons in families and society, encouraging parents to build strong relationships with their children. This day is also a reminder for parents to guide their sons in becoming responsible, kind, and confident individuals.

This day is not an official holiday, but many people celebrate it by spending quality time with their sons, sharing messages of love, and creating meaningful memories. Parents may also use this opportunity to teach their children important life skills or have discussions about their future.

The idea of National Sons Day first appeared in the 1990s when there was a push to create a day similar to National Take Your Daughter to Work Day. Although it did not gain much attention at that time, the concept resurfaced in 2018. Jill Nico, the person behind the modern National Sons Day, wanted a day that would highlight the challenges and responsibilities of raising sons.

When is National Sons Day 2025?

When is National Sons Day 2025? The answer is not straightforward, as National Sons Day is observed on two different dates. Many people celebrate it on March 4, while others recognize it on September 28.

The March 4 date was chosen in 2018 when Jill Nico started promoting National Sons Day. This date is widely recognized in the United States, with families taking the time to appreciate and honor their sons.

However, September 28 is another commonly observed date for National Sons Day. Some sources suggest that this date has been used for years, even before the March 4 observance became popular. Despite the confusion, both dates serve the same purpose—to appreciate sons and encourage meaningful conversations between parents and their children.

Why Are There Two National Sons Days?

The reason for two different National Sons Day celebrations is unclear. One possible explanation is the influence of social media. As people started sharing posts and messages about National Sons Day, different groups began celebrating on different dates. Over time, both dates gained recognition, leading to the current situation where two National Sons Days exist.

Another reason could be the evolution of the holiday itself. The first attempt to create National Sons Day in the 1990s focused on giving boys the same opportunities as girls, similar to Take Your Daughter to Work Day. Later, when Jill Nico promoted the March 4 celebration, the idea took on a new meaning, focusing on strengthening family bonds and encouraging positive parenting.

Since there is no official designation for National Sons Day, people are free to choose the date that best suits them. Some families prefer March 4, while others celebrate on September 28. Some even choose to acknowledge both dates, using them as opportunities to spend more time with their children.

National Sons Day Wishes for Your Boy

1. Happy National Sons Day! You are my greatest blessing, and I am so proud of the person you are becoming.

2. My dear son, you bring so much love and happiness into my life. I am forever grateful for you.

3. Watching you grow into a kind, strong, and amazing person fills my heart with pride. Happy National Sons Day!

4. No matter how old you get, you will always be my little boy. I love you more than words can say!

5. You are my pride, my joy, and my greatest gift in life. Never stop believing in yourself because I believe in you.

6. Having a son like you makes every day special. May your life be filled with happiness and endless possibilities.

7. You bring light and laughter into my world. I am so proud to call you my son!

8. A son like you is a dream come true. Thank you for making my life so wonderful and full of love!

9. Happy National Sons Day to the most incredible son! You make the world a better place just by being in it.

10. No words can express how much I love and appreciate you. You are truly one of a kind!

11. You are my strength, my happiness, and my heart. I will always be here to support you in every step of your journey.

12. Every day with you is a gift. Thank you for being such a wonderful son and an inspiration to our family.

13. I am lucky to have a son as kind, smart, and loving as you. Keep reaching for the stars!

14. May your life be filled with happiness, success, and all the love you deserve. Happy National Sons Day!

15. To my amazing son, always remember that you are strong, capable, and loved beyond measure.

16. You have a heart full of kindness and a soul full of dreams. Keep believing in yourself and chasing your goals!

17. Thank you for filling my life with love, laughter, and pride. You are my greatest joy!

18. No matter where life takes you, always know that I will be here cheering you on and loving you unconditionally.

19. You make my world brighter just by being in it. Keep being your amazing self!

20. I am so grateful for every memory we have made and all the ones yet to come. You are truly a blessing.

21. To my wonderful son, may you always find strength in challenges and joy in the little things.

22. You are capable of achieving anything you set your mind to. Believe in yourself, and the world will open up for you!

23. My dear son, your kindness, courage, and determination inspire me every day. I am so proud of you!

24. Every parent hopes for a son like you—someone who is kind, thoughtful, and full of life. I am beyond lucky to have you.

25. On this special day, always remember that you are loved, cherished, and supported in everything you do. Keep shining!

item.title: Baddie Quotes

item.content:encoded:
Baddie Quotes: 75 Self-Expressions for Your Instagram Captions

Show a different side of yourself with our collection of baddie quotes!

Baddie Quotes: 75 Self-Expressions for Your Instagram Captions

Get ready to express your confidence!

Show a different side of yourself with our collection of baddie quotes!

In this article, we have collected 75 self-expressions that are suitable for your Instagram captions.

These baddie quotes show self-love and strength. These quotes use powerful words to inspire your uniqueness!

These quotes can be shared on social media like Instagram to express your feelings.

Putting baddie quotes on Instagram can also add a cool impression to your social media.

So, get ready to pick out these baddie quotes!

Short Baddie Quotes

  • “Never not chasing a million things I want.”
  • “Confidence on another level.”
  • “Radiate good vibes only.”

  • “Haters will say it’s Photoshop.”
  • “Own your story, but make it fabulous.”
  • “Savage, not average.”
  • “Too glam to give a damn.”
  • “Be a voice, not an echo.”
  • “Beauty with a purpose.”
  • “Just because you’re awake doesn’t mean you should stop dreaming.”

  • “Fluent in silence; vibes speak louder.”
  • “Catch flights, not feelings.”
  • “Glowing, growing, and goals.”

  • “Queens don’t compete with hoes.”
  • “She remembered who she was and changed the game.”
  • “Living my vibe, not my life.”
  • “Less perfection, more authenticity.”
  • “Slay the day away.”
  • “Self-love is the best love.”
  • “Sunshine mixed with a little hurricane.”
  • “Life is short, heels shouldn’t be.”

  • “Stay high on positive vibes.”
  • “Mind your own glow-up.”
  • “Confidence level: Selfie with no filter.”
  • “Living my life in my own lane.”

Funny Baddie Quotes

  • “I’m not a snack; I’m the whole meal.”
  • “I’m not weird; I’m a limited edition.”
  • “I’m not always sarcastic. Sometimes, I’m asleep.”
  • “Slaying is my cardio.”

  • “My life is a constant battle between wanting to look good and wanting to eat.”
  • “I’m not ignoring you; I’m just on a break from your drama.”
  • “I need six months of vacation, twice a year.”
  • “If I was a bird, I know who I’d poop on.”
  • “Life hack: Make them wonder why you’re still smiling.”
  • “The bags under my eyes are designer.”
  • “I’m not bossy; I have leadership skills.”

  • “They say laughter is the best medicine, so here’s your daily dose.”
  • “If you were looking for a sign, here it is: Do better.”

  • “If you think I’m crazy now, you should have seen me in my prime.”
  • “I’m not arguing; I’m just explaining why I’m right, again.”
  • “If you’re waiting for me to care, I hope you brought snacks.”
  • “I’m not lazy; I’m in energy-saving mode.”
  • “Life status: Currently holding it all together with one bobby pin.”
  • “Fluent in emoji, sarcasm, and sass.”

  • “My mascara is too expensive to cry over you.”
  • “Dear haters, I have so much more for you to be mad at. Just be patient.”

  • “I’m not short; I’m concentrated awesome.”
  • “I’m not saying I’m Wonder Woman, but have you ever seen us in the same room together?”
  • “Life is short, smile while you still have teeth.”
  • “I’m a rebel just for kicks now.”

Sassy Baddie Quotes

  • “Life isn’t perfect, but your vibe can be.”
  • “Chin up, princess – or the crown slips.”
  • “Classy, bougie, ratchet – in that order.”
  • “Breaking hearts and breaking rules.”

  • “Attitude on point, eyeliner sharper than a knife.”
  • “Fluent in silence; sass speaks volumes.”
  • “I’m not sugar and spice; I’m hot sauce and ice.”
  • “Not everyone likes me, but not everyone matters.”
  • “Confidence level: Kanye West.”
  • “Diamond in the rough with a touch of gold.”
  • “Too busy watering my own grass to notice if yours is greener.”

  • “Mind your business, glow, and prosper.”
  • “She believed she could, so she did.”
  • “I’m not bossy; I’m the boss.”

  • “Diamonds were once coal – pressure made me a baddie.”
  • “Queen of the selfie game, no crown needed.”
  • “Born to stand out, not fit in.”
  • “Making waves in a world full of ripples.”
  • “Stilettos on, world off.”
  • “Confidence that screams, ‘Watch me.'”
  • “Slaying the game, one selfie at a time.”

  • “Elegance is an attitude.”
  • “Fearless, flawless, fierce.”
  • “Blending in is not my forte.”
  • “Never not on cloud nine.”

Author

Rizki Amelia Putri (intern)

item.title: Best Marvel Animated Movies
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
7 Best Marvel Animated Movies You Need To Watch

7 Best Marvel Animated Movies You Need To Watch

When it comes to Marvel Animated movies, there are some hidden gems that are definitely worth a watch.

From heroes like Spider-Man and Doctor Strange to epic adventures with the Hulk, these animated films bring the Marvel Universe to life in a whole new way. Let's take a closer look at some of the best Marvel Animated movies you need to add to your watchlist.

1. Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse (2018)

(Watch on: Vudu, Apple TV, and Amazon Prime Video)

Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse

In this movie, we follow the journey of Miles Morales, a teenager who gains superpowers after being bitten by a radioactive spider. As he navigates his new responsibilities as Spider-Man, Miles discovers that there are other versions of Spider-Man from different dimensions, all coming together to defeat a common enemy.

2. Big Hero 6 (2014)

(Watch on: Disney+, Vudu, Apple TV, and Amazon Prime Video)

Big Hero 6

Set in the futuristic city of San Fransokyo, Big Hero 6 tells the story of Hiro Hamada, a young robotics prodigy who forms a superhero team with his inflatable robot Baymax and a group of friends. Together, they must uncover the mystery behind a dangerous villain who threatens their city.

3. Planet Hulk (2010)

(Watch on Amazon Prime Video)

Planet Hulk

After being exiled from Earth, the Hulk crash-lands on the planet Sakaar, where he is forced to participate in gladiatorial games. As the Hulk rises through the ranks, he must choose between seeking revenge on those who banished him or finding a new purpose in this alien world.

4. Ultimate Avengers: The Movie (2006)

(Watch on: Amazon Prime Video)

Ultimate Avengers: The Movie

When Earth is threatened by an alien invasion, Nick Fury assembles a team of superheroes, including Captain America, Thor, and Iron Man, to defend the planet. Together, they must put aside their differences and work together to save humanity from destruction.

5. Doctor Strange (2007)

(Watch on: Amazon Prime Video)

Doctor Strange

This animated feature follows the story of Doctor Stephen Strange, a brilliant but arrogant surgeon who loses the use of his hands in a car accident. Desperate to regain his abilities, Strange seeks out the Ancient One, a powerful sorcerer who trains him in the mystic arts. As Doctor Strange hones his skills, he becomes the Earth's Sorcerer Supreme, defending the world from dark forces.

6. Ultimate Avengers II (2006)

(Watch on: Google Play)

Ultimate Avengers II

In this sequel to Ultimate Avengers: The Movie, the superhero team faces an even greater threat as they encounter an ancient alien race known as the Chitauri. With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, the Ultimate Avengers must once again come together to protect humanity.

7. Hulk Vs. (2009)

(Watch on: Amazon Prime Video and Google Play.)

Hulk Vs.

This animated film features two short stories, one in which the Hulk battles Wolverine and another in which he faces off against Thor. As these iconic Marvel heroes clash, audiences are treated to epic showdowns and intense action sequences.

item.title: gta
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
GTA Trilogy Definitive Edition Will Be Available on Netflix!

The GTA games are reportedly free to play for the Netflix users.

GTA Trilogy Definitive Edition Will Be Available on Netflix!

After previously being criticized by gamers, the existence of GTA Trilogy Definitive Edition continues.

This remastered game series released by Rockstar Games is rumored to be available on Netflix soon!

In fact, the GTA games are reportedly free to play for the Netflix users.

Is that true?

BIG NEWS: GTA III, Vice City, and San Andreas from the Grand Theft Auto Series are coming to Netflix Games for mobile on December 14! pic.twitter.com/qe9DGOHXyO

— Netflix (@netflix) November 29, 2023

GTA Trilogy Definitive Edition will be free to play for Netflix subscribers through Android and iOs.

The GTA Trilogy Definitive Edition, which consists of GTA 3, GTA Vice City, and GTA San Andreas, can reportedly be accessed for free by Netflix users.

This was announced by Netflix directly through its official blog and platforms like "X".

As is known, users can actually play these three classic GTA games on Android and iOS smartphones.

However, the games aren't come for free and had to be purchased from the app store.

Currently, in the Google Play Store (Android) and Apple App Store (iOS), GTA: San Andreas is priced at US$7, while GTA: Vice City and GTA 3 are priced at US$5 each.

While on Netflix, users only need to subscribe to Netflix services per month to play these three GTA games.

Netflix subscribers can play GTA on their smartphones with customized controls.

In this series, users can play the 3 classic series of GTA that has been updated visually using controls that have been adapted for smartphone users.

To access this service, customers can pre-register before being able to play it on December 14.

item.title: Indian girl
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
6 Photos of Maleesha Kharwa, a Real-Life Cinderella from India

Maleesha Kharwa also known as ‘Princess of the Slum' in India.

6 Photos of Maleesha Kharwa, a Real-Life Cinderella from India

Maleesha Kharwa grew up in Mumbai’s infamous Dharavi slum.

According to The National, she started famous after Robert Hoffman posted his video with Maleesha .

1. Maleesha Kharwa is a girl from the Dharavi dump area in Mumbai.

2. Maleesha Kharwa became a model and popular after accidentally meeting American actor Robert Hoffman 3 years ago.

3. During a music video shoot, Robert Hoffman noticed Maleesha. He posted a video of her on social media. It quickly went viral and made her famous globally.

4. She has been on the covers of famous international fashion magazines such as Vogue and Cosmopolitan.

5. Maleesha used her earnings from modeling to improve her family's living conditions. They into a more comfortable one-room apartment with electricity, a ceiling fan, and tap water.

6. She also became the face of luxury beauty brand Forest Essentials' campaign 'The Yuvati Collection.' Her Instagram has 378k followers.

item.title: fitness
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
55 Fitness Quotes to Stay Motivated and Boost Your Spirit

A fitness journey is a powerful commitment to our physical and mental well-being. But, the way to reach our fitness goals can be filled with challenges, doubts, and tiredness. When our motivation is gone and our spirits need a soft kick, the wisdom of fitness quotes comes to saving.

55 Fitness Quotes to Stay Motivated and Boost Your Spirit

These fitness quotes of inspiration have the power to energize the fire within us. They remind us of our decision to push on and get the sweat.

Whether you are a seasoned fitness lover or a beginner, these motivational fitness quotes will guide you. These powerful words remind you that you are growing stronger. You will be closer to fulfilling your aspirations with each step.

In this article, we collect inspirational fitness quotes. Each holds a powerful message that hits the time.

These fitness quotes resonate with the human spirit. They remind us that fitness is about achieving physical goals. It is also a transformative journey of self-discovery and strength. As we look into the essence of these motivational fitness quotes, we see the power they hold to motivate us.

Let these fitness quotes inspire us to push past our limits. Infuse a deep self-belief that pushes us towards a healthier and happier life. Here are some fitness quotes to keep you motivated, compiled from numerous sources, Wednesday (02/08/2023).

Fitness Quotes for Women

1. “Today is your day. To start Fresh. To eat right. To train hard. To live healthy. To be proud.”

2. “Your only competition is yourself, keep going."

3. “I’m not strong for a girl, I’m just strong.”

4. “Never underestimate the power of a girl who knows what she wants.”

5. “There’s a beast in every woman, and it stirs when you put a barbell in her hands.”

6. “For exercise I like to lift weights, and for cardio I like to lift weights faster…”

7. “Keep you squats low and your standards high.”

8. “Weight loss doesn’t begin in the gym with a dumbbell; it starts in your head with a decision.” – Toni Sorenson

9. “It’s easy to spot strong women. They are the ones who nail it in the gym.”

10. “Can we lift now? Lift happily ever after?”

11. “The face you make when you increase the weights.”

Fitness Quotes for Women

pixabay

Fitness Quotes for Men

12. “The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides the champion from someone else who is not a champion. There is no magic pill." - Arnold Schwarzenegger, seven-time Mr. Olympia

13. "In training, you listen to your body. In competition, you tell your body to shut up.” - Rich Froning Jr., 4-time CrossFit Games champion

14. “A champion is someone who gets up when they can’t.” - Jack Dempsey, American boxer and heavyweight champion

15. “If something stands between you and your success, move it. Never be denied.” - Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson, actor and pro wrestler

16. “Don’t be afraid of failure. This is the way to succeed.” - LeBron James, four-time NBA Championship winner

17. "I have nothing in common with lazy people who blame others for their lack of success. Great things come from hard work and perseverance. No excuses." - Kobe Bryant, 5-time NBA Championship winner

18. “There’s no secret formula. I lift heavy, work hard, and aim to be the best.” - Ronnie Coleman, eight-time Mr. Olympia

19. “If it doesn’t challenge you, it doesn’t change you.” - Fred DeVito, CoreBarreFit co-founder

20. “Keep working even when no one is watching.” - Alex Morgan, soccer player and World Cup winner

21. “I feel an endless need to learn, to improve, to evolve — not only to please the coach and the fans — but also to feel satisfied with myself.” - Cristiano Ronaldo, soccer legend

22. “I will sacrifice whatever is necessary to be the best.” - J.J. Watt, retired football legend

23. “Don’t count the days, make the days count.” -Muhammad Ali

24. “The real purpose of running isn’t to win a race. It’s to test the limits of the human heart.” -Bill Bowerman

25. “The only limit to the height of your achievements is the reach of your dreams and your willingness to work for them.” -Michelle Obama

Fitness Quotes to Inspire You

26. “Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.” -Michael Jordan

27. “Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.” -Michael Jordan

28. “Do not let what you can not do interfere with what you can do.” -John Wooden

29. “Do a little more each day than you think you possibly can.” -Lowell Thomas

30. “Persistence can change failure into extraordinary achievement.” -Matt Biondi

31. “Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.” -Mahatma Gandhi

32. “In training, you listen to your body. In competition, you tell your body to shut up.” -Rich Froning Jr.

33. “Every champion was once a contender that refused to give up.” -Sylvester Stallone

Photo: pexels-cliff-booth

Fitness Quotes That Will Pumping Your Energy

34. “Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.” -Jim Ryan

35. “You have a choice. You can throw in the towel, or you can use it to wipe the sweat off of your face.” -Gatorade

36. “A winner is that person who gets up one more time than she is knocked down.” – Mia Hamm

37. “Work hard in silence. Let success be your noise.” -Frank Ocean

39. ‘The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.’ — Bruce Lee, actor and martial artist

40. ‘Well done is better than well said.’ — Benjamin Franklin, American Founding Father and inventor

41. ‘Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.’ — John Wooden, basketball player and coach

42. ‘Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.’ — Winston Churchill

43. “The journey to stronger muscles passes through sore muscles.” ~ Invajy

44. ‘A champion is someone who gets up when they can’t.’ — Jack Dempsey, professional boxer

Photo: pixabay

Fitness Quotes to Kick Your Butt

45. “If you think lifting is dangerous, try being weak. Being weak is dangerous.” ~ Bret Contreras

46. “Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.” ~ Jim Rohn

47. “Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.” -Lance Armstrong

48. “Someone who is busier than you is running right now.” -Nike

49. “Get comfortable with being uncomfortable!” ~ Jillian Michaels

50. “Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.” -Henry David Thoreau

51. “When I was younger, I was always taught not to make excuses.” -Derek Jeter

52. “The body achieves what the mind believes.”
pixabay/Schäferle

53. “Our growing softness, our increasing lack of physical fitness, is a menace to our security.”~ John F. Kennedy

54. “Once you are exercising regularly, the hardest thing is to stop it.” – Erin Gray

55. “If you don’t make time for exercise, you’ll probably have to make time for illness.” -Robin Sharma

Fitness Quotes

So, grab your water bottle, lace up those sneakers, and prepare to be motivated by these fitness quotes. Embrace sweat and diligence in these moments. You will find the strength to overcome barriers and the courage to change. You will become the most powerful version of yourself. Let these fitness quotes be your true companions, guiding you through the highs and lows of your journey. They will remind you that you are closer to stamina and fulfillment with every drop of sweat.
pexels-leon-ardho

item.title: what is a soulmate
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
What is a Soulmate? 7 Types of Soulmates and Signs You Have Meet Yours

Have you ever wondered what is a soulmate and whether you have met yours? Many people search for that special connection with another person throughout their lives. This deep bond goes beyond normal relationships and creates something truly meaningful.

The idea of finding your perfect match has existed in cultures around the world for thousands of years. From ancient Greek stories to modern movies, people have always believed in special connections between souls. These relationships can change your life in powerful ways.

In this article, we will talk about what is soulmate and see different types of soulmates you can find in your life. We will also talk about some signs that you have met your soulmate. We gathered the information from various sources, Thursday (3/7/2025).

What is a Soulmate?

So, what is a soulmate? A soulmate is someone with whom you share a deep and special connection that feels different from other relationships. This person understands you in ways that others cannot, and being with them feels natural and comfortable. The bond between soulmates goes beyond surface-level attraction or common interests.

When you meet a soulmate, you often feel like you have known them for much longer than you actually have. There is an immediate sense of familiarity and comfort that cannot be explained easily. This connection feels stronger than normal friendships or relationships because it touches something deeper in your soul.

Soulmates help each other grow and become better people through their connection. They support your dreams and goals while also challenging you to reach your full potential. This relationship brings out both your strengths and helps you work on your weaknesses in a loving way.

Do Soulmates Always Have to Be Romantic?

Many people think that soulmates must be romantic partners, but this is not always true. While romantic soulmates do exist, soul connections can happen with many different types of people in your life. Your soulmate could be a best friend, family member, mentor, or even a coworker.

The most important part of a soulmate connection is the deep understanding and bond you share with that person. This special feeling can exist in friendships, family relationships, or professional partnerships just as strongly as in romantic ones. Some people find their strongest soul connection with a lifelong friend rather than a romantic partner.

This broader view of soulmate connections can change how you see the relationships in your life. Your childhood best friend who always knows what to say or the family member who truly gets you might actually be your soulmate. These non-romantic soul connections bring just as much joy and meaning to your life as romantic ones do.

Types of Soulmates

Soul connections come in many different forms, and each type serves a unique purpose in your life. Here are the main types of soulmates you might encounter:

1. Romantic Soulmates

These are the people you fall in love with and want to build a life together. Romantic soulmates share deep emotional and physical connections. They often become life partners and support each other through all of life's challenges and joys.

2. Platonic Soulmates

These soulmates are your closest friends who understand you completely without any romantic feelings. You can share everything with them and feel totally comfortable being yourself. These friendships often last for many years and provide strong emotional support.

3. Twin Flame Soulmates

Twin flames are believed to be two halves of the same soul who share very similar personalities and life experiences. These connections can be romantic or platonic but are always very intense. Twin flame relationships often involve both great joy and significant challenges.

4. Karmic Soulmates

Karmic soulmates come into your life to teach you important lessons or help you grow in specific ways. These relationships might not always be easy, but they help you become a better person. They often appear during important moments when you need to learn something new about yourself.

5. Soul Family

These are family members or people who feel like family with whom you share special bonds. You might have this connection with a sibling, parent, or chosen family member. These relationships provide a sense of belonging and unconditional love.

6. Companion Soulmates

Companion soulmates are people who make life more enjoyable and meaningful through their presence. They might be friends who share your interests or people who bring laughter and joy to your daily life. These connections add richness and happiness to your experiences.

7. Soul Teachers

These soulmates appear to guide you and help you learn important life lessons. They might be actual teachers, mentors, or wise friends who show you new ways of thinking. Soul teachers often appear when you need guidance or direction in your life.

Signs That You Have Met Your Soulmate

Many people wonder if they have already met their soulmate but are not sure how to recognize this special connection. You might have someone in your life who feels important, but you are unsure if they are truly your soulmate. Here are the key signs that indicate you have found your soulmate:

1. Instant Recognition and Comfort

When you meet your soulmate, you feel an immediate sense of familiarity and comfort. It feels like you have known them much longer than you actually have. You can be yourself around them without fear of judgment or rejection.

2. Easy Communication

Talking with your soulmate feels natural and effortless. You understand each other without having to explain everything in detail. Sometimes you can even sense what they are thinking or feeling without them saying anything.

3. Mutual Growth and Support

Your soulmate helps you become a better person by encouraging your goals and dreams. They challenge you to grow while also providing support during difficult times. You both help each other reach your full potential in life.

4. Deep Emotional Connection

You feel a strong emotional bond that goes beyond surface-level attraction or shared interests. You care deeply about their well-being and happiness. Their joy makes you happy, and their pain affects you too.

5. Respect for Differences

While you share many similarities, you also respect and appreciate your differences. Your soulmate accepts you completely, including your flaws and imperfections. You can disagree about things while still maintaining love and respect for each other.

6. Feeling Complete Together

When you are with your soulmate, you feel more complete and balanced as a person. They complement your strengths and help with your weaknesses. Together, you create something stronger than either of you could achieve alone.

7. Unconditional Acceptance

Your soulmate loves and accepts you exactly as you are, without trying to change you. You feel safe to show your true self, including your vulnerabilities and fears. This acceptance creates a foundation of trust and security in the relationship.

8. Shared Values and Goals

You and your soulmate agree on the important things in life, such as values, morals, and life goals. While you might have different interests or hobbies, you share the same basic beliefs about what matters most.

9. Natural Chemistry

There is an undeniable connection between you that feels magnetic and special. This chemistry can be romantic, intellectual, or emotional, depending on the type of soulmate relationship you have. The bond feels stronger than typical relationships.

10. Timeless Connection

Your relationship with your soulmate feels like it exists outside of normal time. Whether you have known them for months or years, the connection feels eternal and unbreakable. You cannot imagine your life without them in it.

item.title: Lana Del Rey
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
Lana Del Rey Responds to Woman Who Calls Her Worshiping the Devil

Influencer Traci Coston recently posted video with caption, 'Demon Energy Destroys Lana Del Rey's Crowd.'

Lana Del Rey Responds to Woman Who Calls Her Worshiping the Devil

Lana Del Rey has finally responded to the claims of a woman who called her a Satanist.

Influencer Traci Coston recently posted a video on Instagram with the caption 'Demon Energy Destroys Lana Del Rey's Crowd.'

She is an influencer who has more than 217,000 followers. Costona is a Christian.

"Lana Del Rey has openly discussed the practice of witchcraft, and look what happened at one of her concerts. This is a real thing." She said in the video.

Coston then shared a clip from Lana Del Rey's August 15 tour in Mexico City. Her video shows fans falling like dominoes during her performance.

"This is not normal. OK, it's not a mosh pit." She continued.

"Whatever witchcraft Lana Del Rey uses to make her music catchy, those demons are invited into the crowd and into you when you attend."

"These demons will destroy your life. How do I know that? Because people come to me seeking deliverance to get rid of the demons they acquired through things like this," she claimed.

"The Bible tells us to shun witchcraft for a reason, because God loves you and is trying to protect you," she added.

Lana Del Rey responds to woman who accused her of witchcraft:

“B!tch I know the Bible verse for verse better than you do. PS you’re giving off super gremlin energy. Not in a good way.” pic.twitter.com/88LxCMGmg1

— Pop Base (@PopBase) October 9, 2023

Lana Del Rey, whose real name is Elizabeth Woolridge Grant, was quick to respond, as reported by WO News.

"B**ch I know the Bible verse for verse better than you do. PS you're giving off super gremlin energy. Not in a good way."

© trstdly 2023

Many fans found the singer's response hilarious.

"Lana shut it down because we all know she's not a demon." response from fans.

"This woman better not mention Lana again." Add more.

"Lana Del Rey may have an angelic voice, but her comeback is razor-sharp." said another.

© trstdly 2023

item.title: capybara
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
7 Captivating Facts About Capybara

7 Captivating Facts About Capybara

Capybaras are fascinating creatures from South America. Here are 7 fun facts about these adorable giant rodents

slide up to find out!

Fast Runners

Capybaras can run at speeds of up to 35 kilometers per hour (21 miles per hour), which is surprising for their size.

Picky Eaters

They are choosy eaters, preferring specific grass species over others.

'Moving Chairs'

Other animals love sitting on capybaras, using them as mobile resting spots. They're like ‘moving chairs’ in the animal world!

They are Considered Fish (By Catholic Church!)

Due to the aquatic nature and popularity of their meat, The Catholic Church considered capybaras fish, allowing them to be eaten during Lent period.

Social Creatures

Capybaras usually live in groups of 10 to 20, with adult males showing dominance. They make dog-like barks when threatened.

Poop Eaters

Although picky, Capybaras are known to eat their own poop. But there’s a good reason for it – capybara poop contains bacteria essential for their digestion. It gives their digestive system a second chance to absorb all the nutrients from the grass they eat.

Unique Pet

In countries like US, some people keep capybaras as pets although it's illegal in some states. Imagine having this unique giant rodent as a pet!

item.title: Most Dangerous Lighthouses
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
The 4 Most Dangerous Lighthouses in the World

The 4 Most Dangerous Lighthouses in the World

Lighthouses symbolize safety and guidance for sailors navigating risky waters around the world.

However, not all lighthouses are safe havens. Some are located in hazardous locations, facing harsh weather conditions and wild terrain. These features make them dangerous for both keepers and visitors. In this article, we will explore the four most dangerous lighthouses in the world.

Most Dangerous Lighthouses

1. St. Joseph Lighthouse in Michigan, US

St. Joseph Lighthouse is known as the "Frozen Tower."

Located on Lake Michigan, this lighthouse is constantly beaten by strong winds and freezing temperatures during winter. The icy conditions make it highly hazardous to keepers to maintain the light. It often required them to chip away at layers of ice to access the tower.

Phare de la Jument in Northwestern France is another dangerous lighthouse. This lighthouse, situated on a rocky outcrop in Brittany, faces powerful waves and violent storms.

2. Phare de la Jument

It can easily sweep away anyone who dares venture too close. The isolated location adds to the difficulty of maintaining the light, making it a challenging task for keepers.

La Corbière Lighthouse in the Channel Islands is also on our list of dangerous lighthouses. It is perched on a rocky outcrop surrounded by rough seas.

3. La Corbière Lighthouse

This lighthouse is constantly exposed to strong winds and crashing waves. The challenging conditions make it risky for keepers to work, directing them to brave the elements to ensure the light is operational.

4. Stannard Rock Lighthouse

Stannard Rock Lighthouse in Michigan, United States, is our final entry on the list of dangerous lighthouses. Located on Lake Superior, this lighthouse is often called the "loneliest lighthouse in the world" due to its remote and isolated location.

The tower sits on a rocky reef and is frequently attacked by fierce storms and high winds. These conditions make it a dangerous place for keepers to live and work.

While lighthouses are essential for guiding ships safely through treacherous waters, some lighthouses pose a significant risk to those who maintain them. These spots are just a few examples of the most dangerous lighthouses in the world.

Keepers who work at these lighthouses face extreme weather conditions, isolation, and rugged terrain that make their job challenging and risky. Despite the risks, these lighthouses invite light for sailors needing guidance. They show the dedication and bravery of those who work to keep them shining bright.

item.title: Best Places To Visit In Goa
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
Top 5 Best Places To Visit In Goa For History Enthusiasts

Goa is not only a paradise for beach-goers. It's also a haven for history buffs. In this article, we will explore some of the best places to visit in Goa for history enthusiasts.

Top 5 Best Places To Visit In Goa For History Enthusiasts

Beyond its reputation as a beach lover's paradise, Goa unfolds as a haven for history enthusiasts. Often hailed as India's tourism capital, this coastal state beckons travelers with not just waves but whispers of its unique past.

Goa's charm lies in its distinct history, having been under Portuguese rule for an extended period. It gives an extraordinary touch to India's diverse cultural canvas. From the grandeur of Basilica Bom Jesus to the vibrant streets of Fontainhas, there are many historical sites in Goa that are worth visiting for history enthusiasts and tourists alike.

In this article, we have selected some of the best places to visit in Goa for history enthusiasts, according to various sources, Tuesday (28/11/2023).

Let's uncover the other side of Goa that makes this charming state so special.

Aguada Fort is one of the most famous historical sites in Goa. It was built in the 17th century by the Portuguese to protect the region from enemy invasions.

1. Aguada Fort

The Aguada Fort is situated on Sinquerim Beach and offers beautiful views of the Arabian Sea. It is a popular tourist attraction and a great place to learn about the history of Goa. The fort also has a lighthouse that was built in the 19th century, which became its famous icon.

Visitors can explore the ramparts, bastions, and cannons within the fort, as well as enjoy the scenic surroundings.

Aguada Fort is a must-visit for anyone interested in history and enjoys breathtaking views.

2. Chapora Fort

Chapora Fort is another famous seaside fort in Goa. This fort is situated on top of a hill near the famous Vagator Beach, North Goa.

Chapora Fort

Chapora Fort was built by the Adil Shahi dynasty. The fort was destroyed and rebuilt by the Portuguese in the 17th century as a means to defend their territory against potential invaders.

Today, it is a popular tourist attraction, drawing visitors who are interested in history and stunning views. It's a famous spot to enjoy the breathtaking sunset view.

The fort has also gained fame through its appearance in popular culture, particularly through its role in the Bollywood movie "Dil Chahta Hai. Whether for its historical significance or its scenic beauty, Chapora Fort continues to attract visitors from around the world.

3. Basilica Of Bom Jesus

Basilica Of Bom Jesus is among the best places to visit in Goa for history buffs. It's a historic church that was built in the 16th century.

The basilica is dedicated to the infant Jesus.

Besides its iconic and beautiful architecture, it is also famous for housing the mortal remains of St. Francis Xavier, a prominent figure in the Roman Catholic Church.

Basilica of Bom Jesus

Visitors can also explore the adjacent art gallery and museum, which display a collection of religious art and artifacts. Today, the Basilica of Bom Jesus is not only a place of worship but also a significant historical and cultural landmark in India. It's listed in the UNESCO World Heritage Site List, making it a great place to visit if you want to learn about Goa's rich history and culture.

Se Cathedral is another important historic church in Goa. It was built between 1562 and 1619 by the Portuguese to commemorate their victory against the Muslim army and the capture of the city of Goa.

4. Se Cathedral

Its awe-inspiring architecture features a blend of Portuguese Manueline and Gothic styles. The Se Cathedral is famous for its giant bell, which is known as the "Golden Bell." The bell is renowned for its rich sound and giant size, which is believed to be the largest in Goa.

The church is adorned with beautiful paintings and intricate carvings. At the side of the church, you can find the famous Chapel of the Cross of Miracles. The chapel is famous as the place where a vision of Jesus Christ appeared in the 17th century.

Fontainhas is the old, historic Latin neighborhood located in the heart of Panaji, the capital city of Goa, India. It is known for its narrow, winding streets, vibrant, colorful houses, and Portuguese architecture.

5. Fontainhas

Fontainhas is a great place to take a leisurely stroll and admire the beautifully preserved buildings that date back to the colonial era. The neighborhood has a unique charm and a relaxed atmosphere, making it a pleasant escape from the hustle and bustle of the city.

The area is filled with charming cafes, boutique shops, and art galleries, making it a popular destination for tourists and locals alike.

item.title: Arizona
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
5 Fun Places To Go In Phoenix, Arizona, With Friends for an Unexceptional Time

These spots will create an unforgettable experience with friends. (Photo by Justin Nealey on pexels)

5 Fun Places To Go In Phoenix, Arizona, With Friends for an Unexceptional Time

Phoenix, Arizona, offers various attractions that invite different interests and age groups. There are a lot of fun places in Phoenix where you can enjoy great company and exciting activities.

It ranges from unique attractions to lively spots. These fun places to go in Phoenix have something for everyone. They ensure you and your friends have a memorable experience.


Fun Places To Go In Phoenix, Arizona, With Friends

Are you looking for adventure, education, or relaxation?

This list of five fun places to visit with friends will provide an unforgettable experience. If you're looking for fun places to go in Phoenix with friends for an exceptional time, let's check it out.


Fun Places To Go In Phoenix, Arizona, With Friends

1. Enchanted Island Amusement Park

For a day filled with thrills and laughter, head to Enchanted Island Amusement Park.

This family-friendly destination features a variety of rides, including roller coasters, water slides, and a Ferris wheel.

The park also features a petting zoo, arcade games, and picnic areas, making it ideal for a fun-filled day with friends.


Fun Places To Go In Phoenix, Arizona, With Friends

2. OdySea Aquarium

Get up close and personal with marine life at OdySea Aquarium, one of the largest aquariums in the United States.

With over 30,000 animals representing 500 species, this attraction offers an immersive experience that leaves you in awe. Explore the exhibits, including the shark tunnel, sea otter habitat, and interactive play areas.
Photo: odyseaaquarium.com

wikimedia

3. Arizona Falls

Escape the hustle and bustle of city life and connect with nature at Arizona Falls. This beautiful waterfall is surrounded by lush greenery and offers a serene atmosphere perfect for a relaxing stroll or picnic. Take in the breathtaking views and enjoy the tranquility of this natural oasis.

4. Phoenix Mountains Preserve

For a more adventurous experience, head to the Phoenix Mountains Preserve.

This 1,200-acre nature reserve offers hiking trails, picnic areas, and stunning city views. Take a leisurely hike or challenge yourself with a more rigorous trail. Visitors can also enjoy the breathtaking vistas from the top.
Photo: flickr/jesserie44

5. Phoenix Zoo

End your day with a visit to the Phoenix Zoo, home to over 200 species of animals worldwide.

Explore the various exhibits, including the African Lion, Monkey Village, and Arizona Trail. The zoo also offers a petting zoo, playground, and picnic areas, making it an excellent spot for families and friends.
Photo: flickr/Leo Boudreau

These five fun places to visit in Phoenix, Arizona, show a mix of adventure, education, and relaxation.

These spots will create an unforgettable experience with friends. Whether looking for thrills, nature, or a day out with friends, Phoenix has something for everyone. Happy holiday!

Fun Places To Go In Phoenix, Arizona, With Friends

item.title: custom car
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
Carmageddon. The Lowest Car in the World

Carmageddon. The Lowest Car in the World

This extraordinary vehicle has emerged as a mark of its innovation and unconventional design.

This fascinating footage showcases what is being hailed as the “world’s lowest car". Sparking fascination and curiosity among viewers.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by 𝗖𝗔𝗥𝗠𝗔𝗚𝗛𝗘𝗗𝗗𝗢𝗡 (@carmagheddon)

Surprisingly is that this car doesn’t have wheels or gates on it. The video shared on Twitter shows a cyan top of a car with windows and the flap of the front bonnet moving on the road.

The people in the videos can be seen clapping and recording the innovation. The tweet's caption read, “The lowest car in the world.”

The car was made by an automobile influencer from Italy who runs the YouTube channel Carmageddon. The channel has a video of the men transforming cars into something unique.

They even shared a video of them transforming a broken car into the Lowest car in the world. It showed them installing an electric robo which they placed on a wooden board.

Officially, the PLP 50, manufactured by Peel Engineering Company, is the tiniest production car ever created; it is 52.8 inches (134 centimeters) in length, 39 inches (99 centimeters) in width, and 39.4 inches (100 centimeters) in height.

They even added a GoPro on the head of the car so they could see if any obstacle was on the way.

item.title: five nights at freddy's
item.dc:creator: Galang
item.content:encoded:
"Five Nights At Freddy's 2" Movie Will Be Made Soon?

This was revealed by one of the actors in the movie.

"Five Nights At Freddy's 2" Movie Will Be Made Soon?
